1.content:
After getting lost a couple of times, you finally manage to find your way from the visitor parking lot to your sister’s apartment. You ring the doorbell, and then you rock back and forth on your feet as you wait for somebody to let you in. A few seconds later, you can hear somebody run down the stairs inside, and then the front door finally opens to reveal Stephanie, your younger sister.

“Jake!?” says Stephanie, wrinkling her nose and cocking her head to the side. “What are you doing here?”

“I hear you were throwing a party,” you say teasingly. Stephanie rolls her eyes at you, but then she gives you a quick hug and leads you inside.

The apartment is surprisingly quiet. You can’t even hear anyone else walking around, though occasionally you hear the odd sound or two from upstairs. After showing you around, your sister brings you to the kitchen and hands you a peculiar-looking bottle of beer. Assuming it must just be some local microbrew, you accept the drink without a second thought and take a sip. You head back to the living room and sit down on the couch, but after a few more moments you start to feel very tired. After absently taking another sip of the beer, you pass out on the couch.

Once you fall asleep, your body shrinks down to the size of an ant. Where are you when you wake up?
1.title: Heading Over to the Party

11.content:
Groaning, Jake's eyes slowly opened up as he looked forward, seeing what he saw in front of him before he fell asleep, only he felt lower. He figured he must have slid down a bit in his sleep and tried to sit back up straight. He did, but everything still looked like it was higher. Then he turned and saw the armrest of the couch. Only now it looked as tall as a mountain. His senses coming fully back, he stood up and turned around seeing that he was standing on the couch, but he himself had shrunk down. The cushions that he had not too long ago pressed his back into had suddenly become the equivalent of Mount Everest.

"Okay. Okay Jake just calm down." He said trying not to panic. "This is just a dream. That beer Stephanie gave me must have been stronger than I thought."

Deciding to test his theory, he raised a hand and brought the palm to his own face slapping himself. It wasn't a dream. The pain felt too real. Which meant this too, was actually happening. He had shrunk.

"What the hell is happening?" He thought aloud again. "What did I even do? All I did was come in and Steph gave me......that beer."

It hit him like a sack of bricks. This was Stephanie's doing it. It had to be. But what was he supposed to do about it now? All it would take was a light breeze and he could go flying to who knows where. Then footsteps were heard coming closer to the couch. Jake saw one of Stephanie's friends come to the couch wanting to sit down and rest her feet.

Who was it?
11.title: Still on the couch.

choices: Who cares? Get out of there!
12.content:
Without fully realizing that you ever passed out in the first place, you wake up to find yourself lying on top of something soft and squishy. You sit up, shaking your head to clear the grogginess, and you immediately realize something is very wrong. When you look straight ahead, you appear to be sitting in a fairly average bedroom. Upon further inspection, however, you notice that everything looks bigger than it should. You turn to your right, and you see what appears to be a pillow. You're clearly sitting on a bed, but the pillow looks like it's a football field away. Lying back down, you stare up at the ceiling. This almost looks normal too, but the ceiling is clearly much too far away.

"What the hell..." you groan to yourself, barely able to believe what's happening. That beer Stephanie gave you must have been stronger than you thought. But that can't be right either: you don't feel even a little bit tipsy. You sit up again, and you finally notice that there's a desk across the room from you. Somebody's sitting at it, facing away from you. They look somewhat familiar from behind, but obviously they're just as big as the rest of the room.

Whose room are you in?
12.title: In somebody's bedroom

choices: Wait here until Steph gets up
121.content:
"Hey, wait a minute ... Steph!" Jake yelled, finally regaining the mental awareness necessary to identify the person sitting at the desk as his sister. "Steph, what the hell is going on?!" he demanded, beginning to climb down from the bed so he could make his way over to the desk.

Jake plopped down onto the floor of his sister's room and turned around to face her desk. "Hey! Yo, Steph!" Jake tried again as he jogged over to Stephanie. Clearly he was too small to be heard from such a distance.

When he reached the desk, he looked up at his sister's tremendous figure occupying the chair. She seemed to be writing something, as her right arm was moving a bit but the rest of her body seemed fixed. For a moment the back of her head moved as she reached her left arm up to her face to rub her eye, but she soon resumed her pose.

"HEY! STEPH! SIS!" Jake bellowed fruitlessly. His giant sister showed no signs of acknowledging his presence. "My God, this is insane," he mumbled.

Sizing up the leg of the desk chair in front of him, Jake wrapped his arms and his legs around it and began to climb it like a smooth tree. Though the lack of rough bark was pleasant, it also made gaining traction that much more difficult. Huffing and puffing, Jake struggled to scale the leg, but eventually was able to reach upward and grab onto the seat of the chair.

Hoisting himself up pull-up-style, an exhausted Jake climbed up onto the seat of the chair, right next to his sister's left thigh. Grabbing the denim of Stephanie's jeans, Jake pushed on his sister's leg, but there was no way he could possibly make her budge. Jake sighed.

"Hey!" he called, looking up at his sister. "This is ridiculous, Steph, what the hell did you do to me?!" Still no answer. "Damn it," he muttered, feeling defeated. Grabbing Stephanie's jeans again, Jake climbed up onto his sister's left leg and sat down. "Well, there's really only one thing to do now..."
121.title: Stephanie's room

1212.content:
"If she won't notice me down here, maybe she'll notice me in front of her face!" With that, Jake stood up on Stephanie's thigh and turned to face the rest of her body. She was still not moving much; Jake suspected she was still intent on writing something.

Now I guess she might be a little easier to climb up the front,
just because of the way she's shaped. Ugh, if only it wasn't my sister I have to climb up, Jake thought, unwilling to grab Stephanie the way he'd have to in order to scale her from the front. I'm going up her back, he decided.

Jake approached his sister's waist and carefully shimmied himself around to her lower back. "Okay, here goes!" he announced, grabbing handfuls of the girl's shirt. The climb actually wasn't too bad -- it was certainly easier than climbing the smooth wooden chair leg straight up. Soon Jake had reached Stephanie's shoulder, and he grappled his way on top of it. He looked down and saw that Stephanie was reading a book. A pencil in her right hand indicated that she was also making some notes in it. I guess she's working on some homework before the party? Or did I miss the entire thing?

Jake turned to face Stephanie's neck, then yelled up at her ear: "Hey, Steph! It's me, Jake! What the hell is going on?!" Jake seemed to have finally reached the right height, because Stephanie immediately responded to the noise. Turning her head inquisitively to the left, she shifted her eyes down just a bit and spotted her tiny brother.

"Oh, jeez, you scared me! What are you doing over here?" She reached up to her shoulder with her left hand and, before Jake could even dive out of the way, she grabbed him with her thumb and index finger.

"Aaarrgh! Whoa, whoa, whoa, stop! Careful!" Jake protested. Stephanie opened her hand, releasing Jake into her palm, which she brought in front of her face. "Oh my God, this is crazy! I've got to be dreaming right now!" Jake exclaimed, slightly terrified as he looked straight at the face of his sister, a face he knew quite well, now simply monumental in size.

Stephanie gave a little nervous giggle, flashing teeth larger than Jake's entire body. "No, this is totally real!" she insisted. "Look, I'm really sorry, but I can't have you interfering in my party tonight. That "beer" you had when you walked in was -- well I don't really know what it is, but it's the reason you're so small. I didn't know you'd get this tiny, though," she admitted, bringing her brother up closer to her eyes and looking at his little figure.

"Steph, are you insane?!" Jake responded, infuriated. "Great, so you didn't know it'd make me this small. Why'd you try to shrink me in the first place?! And when the hell does this stuff wear off?!" he demanded.

"Yeah, ummmm, I don't really know that either--" the girl admitted further, shifting her gaze away awkwardly.

"Are you kidding me?!" Jake roared. He was beginning to panic. "It's not permanent, right. Right?!"

"No, no, it's definitely not permanent! It'll wear off, I -- I just don't know when," Stephanie said, embarrased.

"Well, great!" Jake screamed sarcastically, throwing up his hands. "Why can't I come to your party anyway? I'm only your damn brother! And if you didn't want me here, why not just not invite me?"

"Well," Stephanie began sheepishly. She was beginning to feel a little stupid for doing all this in the first place, but the last thing she wanted to do was admit she was wrong to her brother, who she was still confident was in no real danger, so she began to get defensive. "Well, I don't know, this way seemed like more fun, I guess! You can be a real pain at these parties, and I don't need you hitting on all my friends. Besides, I didn't really invite you, you just sort of found out about it, and this was another plan I had up my sleeve!"

"Well, your plan sucks, and you need to make me normal size again right now!" Jake shouted.

"No!" Stephanie exclaimed, pulling her hand and Jake away from her face. "I don't even know if it would work, and I can't trust you not to be a nuisance at this party."

"Oh, give me a break!" he argued. "I'll just go home then, you jerk!"

"I can't trust you to do that either," his sibling retorted.

"Oh, for God's sake, just do it! I promise to leave!" Jake pleaded with her.

Stephanie rolled her enormous eyes and brought her brother up closer to her face. Jake kept his balance as her hand moved, placing him just in front of her nose. Her nostrils were frighteningly large compared to Jake; he could feel the gentle breeze from them every time she breathed in and out.

"Look," Steph spoke calmly to Jake, teasing him a bit. "Just be a good little guy for the next couple of hours and maybe I'll introduce you to one of my friends."
1212.title: Scaling Stephanie

12122.content:
"No way, you lunatic!" Jake yelled. He was not about to let Stephanie get away with this, and he had just hatched a plan. Looking up at his sister's nose, with it's huge, breathing nostrils, Jake gulped over what he was about to do, then took a running leep off of Stephanie's palm, aiming straight for her nose.

"Oh, come on, Jake--" Stephanie began, but before she could continue trying to bargain with her tiny brother, she noticed that he had just launched himself off of her hand. "Wait, what the hell are you doing?!" she exclaimed.

Jake sailed through the air briefly, spread eagle and reaching out as far as he could in front of him. Fortunately for Jake the first step of his wild plan was successful; his hands met with the flesh of Stephanie's left nostril, which he gripped tightly. Stephanie let out a squeal of shock when he did so. The momentum he had from flying through the air transferred and immediately allowed him to swing himself up into the nostril. Jake landed flat on his back on the moist wall of Stephanie's nose, his adrenaline still pumping furiously from the stunt he had just pulled off. He grimaced a little as he looked around at the inside of his sister's nose. Wind from her breathing rustled his hair.

"Ah! Jake! What -- did you just -- did you just --" Stephanie stammered, unable to process what she had just witnessed. "Jake, what the hell? Get out of my nose, you freak!" she demanded, shock quickly turning to anger.

Jake caught his breath. "Wow, I can't believe that worked!" he said to himself, quite satisfied. He sat up in Stephanie's nose. "Gross," he complained as his hands made contact with the slightly wet flesh. "Hey, Steph!" he shouted to his sister, announcing his plan. "You said you don't know when this stuff wears off, right?"

"What?! Why, are you talking about?" Stephanie shouted back, wrinkling her nose. Jake's presence was irritating in more ways than one, and she didn't have time for his games.

Whoa, Jake breathed, struggling to maintain balance as Steph's nose moved. God, I hope this works. "Well, now you have no choice! Promise you'll make me normal right now or I'll just chill here 'til that stuff wears off! I don't think you want a normal-sized me inside of your head," he teased, trying his best to scare her a little.

The thought Jake had just planted in Stephanie's head did frighten her a little. Jake, that little itch in her nose, was now worrying her. Steph's eyes widened as she realized that what Jake was talking about was entirely possible. "You wouldn't ..." she started, trying to call her brother's bluff, but she didn't want to let on the fact that Jake's suggestion had actually scared her.

"Oh yeah?" Jake replied, putting his arms behind his head and leaning against the inner wall of Stephanie's nose. "I don't know, Steph, I don't think you want to try me. It's really pretty relaxing in here! And all I have to do is wait," he warned. He hoped he could scare her out of calling his bluff, because truthfully Jake knew there was no way he could go through with what he was threatening.

He's right, Stephanie thought, looking around for a way out of her situation. She hated that he was right. Stephanie didn't want to let Jake win this, but she was also too scared to call his bluff. The girl looked down at her right hand, which was now tightly gripping her pencil in fear, and decided how she was going to deal with the tickle inside her nose.
12122.title: Up Stephanie's nose

121222.content:
Stephanie continued squeezing her pencil in her hand until her knuckles were white. She just didn't know what to do. As she thought, she absently wrinkled her nose again as Jake's subtle movements tickled her slightly. Stephanie puckered her lips and wiggled her nose back and forth, and once she realized what she was doing, her eyes widened as she began to formulate a plan. Standing up from her desk, Stephanie walked over to her wardrobe and threw it open. She pushed past her clothes until she found a ridiculous and colorful feather boa. Stephanie wasn't really sure why she still had this thing. She only ever wore it once as a joke, and she never had any plans to wear it again, but she supposed she was glad to have it now. Starting to smile, Stephanie grabbed a single feather and pulled it off of the boa.

"Be careful, Jake," said Stephanie, twirling the feather between her fingertips. "You're tickling my nose."

"What?" Jake asked, genuinely confused. Before he could figure out what his sister meant, what Jake could only describe as a giant pink tree suddenly burst in through the opening of the nostril. It only took Jake a second to realize what Steph was doing, and it became obvious that she had called his bluff.

"You wouldn't," Jake mumbled, far too quiet for his sister to hear. She seemed to respond anyway as she began to wave the feather up and down, gently tickling the inside of her nostrils.

Stephanie wrinkled her nose and squeezed her eyes shut as she began to stir up the urge to sneeze. The inside of her nostril tickled horribly, though she wasn't ready just yet. She took a deep breath, causing her head to tip back, and once she regained control of herself she only tickled more intensely.

"Ah... Ah-Ahh-Ahhh-!"
121222.title: Sneeze Jake out!

choices: Stephanie fights back the sneeze and gets the door
Stephanie lets the sneeze out, then gets the door
1212222.content:
"Wait, Steph, wait! Don't!" Jake knew from the sounds his sister was now making that she wasn't just kidding around. He probably had very little precious time before she sneezed. Starting to panic, he grabbed on tightly to one of Stephanie's quivering nose hairs and shut his eyes. He began to plead with his sister: "C'mon, Steph, please! Stop it! With me at this size, if you sneeze you could kill me!"

"Don't you ... Aaahhh ... know not to ... aaahhhh ... climb inside people's noses?" the girl retorted, breathing heavily as the urge to sneeze intensified.

"I'm sorry! I'm sorry!" Jake yelled back. The inside of Stephanie's nose was starting to rumble. She could sneeze at any moment. "I wasn't actually gonna go through with it anyway, I was just bluffing! Just stop and let me out of your nose, please!"

Stephanie's eyes were shut now and her mouth was open slightly as she prepared to let the sneeze out. She actually did take pity on Jake and was beginning to reconsider her actions. She certainly didn't want to hurt her brother, but she needed him out of her nose, too. The only problem now was that the sneeze was pretty far along already.

Knock, knock, knock. "Hey, Steph!"

Jake's eyes popped open as he registered the sound of someone at Stephanie's door. Yes! Perfect timing!

Stephanie's eyes shot open as well. Feather still stuck firmly up her nose, the girl briefly fought back the urge to sneeze in order to answer. "Just ... just a sec!"
1212222.title: Saved by the bell?

choices: The visitor brings Steph downstairs to the party
The visitor comes in to hang out
12122221.content:
Stephanie quickly pulled the feather out of her nostril and dropped it to the floor. Jake breathed a sigh of relief, but he had no time to relax before Stephanie reached her hand back up to her face and squeezed her nose in an attempt to hold in the building sneeze. Steph took a deep breath and held it, squeezing her eyes shut and wrinkling her nose as she pinched it, and after a few seconds the urge to sneeze was gone. Her nose still tickled a bit, but she wasn't in any danger of sneezing.

"Hey, are you okay in there?" came the voice from outside, catching both Steph and Jake off guard. Stephanie jumped a little, but she quickly regained her composure as she approached the door.

"Yeah, I'm fine," replied Stephanie, rubbing her fingers back and forth under her nose. "I almost sneezed. What's up?"
12122221.title: Stephanie fights back the sneeze and gets the door

121222211.content:
"Oh, okay," the visitor replied as she opened the door. It was Beth. "People are starting to show up for the party! I just saw Veronica's car pull up, and I don't know if she brought anyone else with her."

"Oh, cool," Steph remarked. The whole situation with Jake had caused her to completely lose track of time. "Would you get the door? I'll meet you downstairs in, like, one minute."

"Sure, no problem," said Beth, and she went off to go greet the guests.

Stephanie backed into her room a little, just to make sure she couldn't be overheard. She wrinkled her nose, which still tickled a little. "Hey, Jake, you okay?"

Inside Stephanie's nose, Jake was still tightly hugging the nose hair he had grabbed onto when his sister threatened to sneeze. "I mean, I've been better!" Jake retorted. "First you shrink me, then you try to sneeze me out of your nose!"

"Well, it was your idea to go up there!" Stephanie shot back with a laugh. "Look, I'm sorry for the whole shrinking thing ... but now guests are arriving and we have to go greet them."

"We? What do you mean we? I thought you didn't even want me here," said Jake in disbelief.

"All right, well not literally we. I don't want anyone to see you because I'd have a hell of a lot of explaining to do. But it's too dangerous for me to leave you here alone, so you gotta come with me," she explained.

Jake sighed. It didn't sound like he would be getting out of his sister's nose anytime soon. "So, I should stay where I am? You better treat me well or, you know, I can make you sneeze all over your friends," he teased, gently moving the nose hair back and forth.

Steph rolled her eyes and rubbed her nose. "Oh, please, you were practically panicking before when I almost sneezed." She did actually feel a little bad about that. "I think we both know the ball's in my court on that one. You better behave yourself, or I can sneeze you out pretty fast, bro," she said, flaring her nostrils. "I mean, you do kinda tickle in there ... I don't know, what do you wanna do?"
121222211.title: The visitor brings Steph downstairs to the party

1212222111.content:
Jake thought for a moment, but it didn't take him long to realize he didn't have much choice. He folded his arms and huffed before finally giving his response.

"Well, this sucks, but I don't really know where else I can go," he said, leaning against one of Stephanie's nose hairs. "I mean, where else can you put me? In your pocket? I'll get crushed! I should be fine in here as long as you don't get punched in the face. On second though, maybe I should be worried about that. Lord knows you deserve it."

"Hey, watch it!" Stephanie shot back, pointing a finger up her nose. "You're currently enjoying my hospitality! You should be grateful!"

"Uh, Steph? I'm in your nose."

"You said it yourself, you don't have anywhere else to go. Plus, you should just be glad you're in my nose and not Beth's. I mean, I love her, but come on! Can you stop whining about your allergies for two seconds!?"

As if on cue, Beth blew her nose loudly enough for Steph and Jake to hear it from upstairs. Stephanie rolled her eyes and gestured out her door.

"See what I mean?"

"Alright, alright! I get it! Just go have your damn party!"
1212222111.title: Those nose is fine!

choices: Stephanie excuses herself to go scold Jake
12122221112.content:
"Don't mind if I do," Stephanie answered, proceeding to march down the stairs to meet Beth and the guests.

"Hey, there you are! What's up, Steph?" Natasha greeted. They hugged. "I brought everyone; I'm gonna DD," she explained, gesturing to Brianna and Veronica.

"Hey, guys!" said Stephanie to the other girls. "If you wanna drink, Natasha, you're all welcome to crash here. There isn't much space, I guess, but you could fit. Where'd Beth go?" she asked, suddenly realizing that her roommate was missing.

"I think she went to blow her nose or something, poor thing. I'll go get her!" Veronica answered, going to retrieve Beth.

***

Jake, bored, started to tune the sounds of the party out as music was put on and some of the girls began dancing while others chatted. He sighed, still leaning up against his sister's nose hair. His stomach rumbled. He was pretty hungry, although the general atmosphere of his surroundings was rather unappetizing.

Jake sighed. Growing more and more bored by the minute, he grinned when he thought of a way to have a little fun with his sister by annoying her. She deserved to be a little embarassed anyway, considering all she had done to him. Standing up and stepping away from the nose hair, he turned around to face it, then kicked the wall of Stephanie's nose near it lightly. He smiled. "Gonna make your nose itch worse than Beth's," he laughed.

Stephanie wasn't nearly as pleased. She was currently sitting down on the couch, in the middle of talking to Natasha. She definitely felt the kick, although it wasn't really enough to produce more than a little tickle. Damn it, Jake, what the hell are you doing in there? she thought to herself, reaching her finger up to rub the bridge of her nose. Natasha barely noticed.

"Ha!" Jake exclaimed, laughing as he could tell that his sister was rubbing her nose. Still grinning, Jake gave her another swift little kick.
12122221112.title: Try to embarrass her

121222211121.content:
Stephanie sniffed and squeezed her eyes shut for a second, fighting off an urge to sneeze as she felt Jake's kick.

"Sorry, Nat, I'll just be right back. Bathroom!" Stephanie quickly told her friend. She got up from the couch and, rubbing her finger under her nostrils, scooted off to the upstairs bathroom.

Locking the door behind her, the girl turned to face the mirror and confront her brother. "Jake! What the hell are you doing?" she demanded, looking down at her nose cross-eyed.

"What's the matter, Steph?" Jake replied with mock concern. "Not having fun at your party? I don't understand why, I'm having a ball." He sat down inside his sister's nose.

"Yeah, whatever, just stop trying to make me sneeze, you jack-ass!" Stephanie demanded.

"I'm not trying to make you sneeze ... necessarily. I mean, that wouldn't be too pleasant for me -- I'm just trying to piss you off," her brother admitted.

"Well, it's working ... because I'm pissed. You're also gonna make me sneeze if you're not careful," she continued, rubbing her nose again. "Just cut it out!"

Jake rolled his eyes. Stephanie moved over to the toilet and grabbed onto her jeans, then paused for a second and looked up. "Hold up, what's your line of sight like in there, Jake?"

"Huh? What do you mean?" a confused Jake replied.

"I mean, what can you see from inside my nose?" she clarified.

"What kind of a question is that? It's your nose, Steph! It's pink. I can see your nose hairs, I --"

"No," Stephanie interjected. "Outside that. What can you see outside my nose?"

"Oh. Well, sure, if I look down I can see the bottom half of the bathroom wall, I guess. Your legs, your shoes ..."

"Yeah, that's what I thought," Stephanie responded. "Well, I have to pee."

"Okay, great. So?" Jake could not tell where this was going.

"So? So I don't want you to watch," Stephanie said.

"Ew!" Jake spat. "What the hell makes you think I'd wanna watch?"

"Ugh, not watch, I mean I just don't want you to see anything! Can you go back further inside my nose?" Stephanie asked him.

"Um, sure. Yeah, I can do that," Jake agreed. "I'm bored anyway, I may as well do some exploring."

"Well don't get lost! I just want you away from my nostril while I pee, that's all," Stephanie explained.

"Yeah, yeah, sounds good," said Jake as he turned around to face the back of his sister's nose and set off.
121222211121.title: Stephanie excuses herself to go scold Jake

choices: Jake tries to find his way out
Jake makes Stephanie sneeze him out
1212222111211.content:
Hoping that Jake would actually do as she said, Stephanie waited for a few minutes. Even if she really did have to pee, she wasn't sure if she'd even be able to, knowing her brother was inside her own head and all. She simply sat on the closed toilet seat lid for a moment, stood up, and flushed. Hopefully that would be enough to get Jake to buy it. Either way, she also didn't see the point in telling him. Knowing Jake, he'd simply take that as permission to go back to tickling her. Stephanie was sure Jake would figure it out eventually, but at least this might buy her another moment or two.

Meanwhile, Jake walked calmly away from the opening of Stephanie's nostril, heading deeper and deeper into her nose. The web of hairs became thicker as he progressed, but eventually it began to thin out again. Before long Stephanie's nose hairs had all but disappeared, leaving only the smooth surfaces of her nasal passages and a few mounds of mucus. This far away from the opening, it had also started to get rather dark. Jake was still able to see, but the light coming in through Stephanie's nostril was more like the end of a distant tunnel.

"Whoa, kind of spooky," Jake said out loud. Stephanie either didn't hear him or was ignoring him, but he didn't really expect her to reply anyway. He continued even farther, and unfortunately by the next time he stopped himself, the light from the opening of the nostril was so dim he couldn't tell what direction it was coming from anymore. Jake assured himself he could simply go back the way he came, but the more he thought about it, the more he felt like he might have gotten turned around.
1212222111211.title: Jake gets lost

choices: Jake really can't move -- tickle yourself, Steph!
12122221112111.content:
"Crap..." Jake muttered to himself, now beginning to fear he was completely lost within Stephanie's head. There weren't exactly a large number of different pathways to take, but the more Jake moved toward what he had thought was the exit, the less familiar his surroundings seemed to become.

The light coming in through Stephanie's nostril was also quite dim, and before long Jake tripped on, well, something he couldn't see and fell face first into some nose hairs, which seemed to seize the opportunity to entangle him.

Jake spat as he toppled into the wet flesh and hairs, moving his limbs a bit before they became more ensnared. A gust of wind whipped Jake in the face as his sister sniffed.

Oh my God, he's at it again! "Jake, what the hell is your problem?" Stephanie demanded, opening her eyes after having squeezed them shut in irritation. "Stop tickling my nose!"

"Oh, um --" Jake cleared his throat, slightly embarassed by his predicament. "Hey, Steph ... Uh, are you ... done?"

"Am I done?" Stephanie began. "What -- oh, yes, yeah, I'm done, you can come back out now. What are you doing, though?"

"Well, it's ... it's actually kinda funny, but ... I'm, uh, a little bit stuck at the moment," Jake admitted.

"What do you mean stuck? I told you not to get lost! Did you get lost?" Stephanie scolded her brother.

"No, no! Well, sort of. I'm literally stuck now, though. Like, tangled up in your nose hairs and everything."

"Eww!" an unamused Stephanie replied. "I don't need to hear the details, just get yourself unstuck!"

"If I could, I would have already, Steph!" Jake shot back. "I'm tangled pretty good."

Stephanie sighed and rolled her eyes. "Well, I don't know, can you move around and try to make me sneeze? I can try to sneeze you out into a tissue," she offered half-heartedly. She didn't want to give Jake permission to start tickling her again, but it did seem to be a logical solution to the problem.
12122221112111.title: Jake tries to find his way out

choices: Somebody else walks in on Stephanie
121222211121112.content:
Jake flailed around a bit, but he found himself unable to accomplish much of anything. Getting the go-ahead from Stephanie already made tickling her a bit less fun, and now he couldn't even do it if he wanted to. Jake tried to move a few more times, but he was still thoroughly ensnared.

"Uh, Steph? I'm really stuck."

Stephanie groaned, rolling her eyes. She rubbed a finger back and forth under her nostrils, and then she looked cross-eyed down at her nose.

"Ugh, you're so useless. Do I have to do everything?"

Ignoring Jake's inevitable complaining, Stephanie placed a hand on her chin and thought about what to do. Even after everything that had happened today, making herself sneeze still wasn't something that came naturally to her. Eventually she opened the medicine cabinet and retrieved a q-tip, figuring that this would work as well as anything else. Without even giving Jake a warning, Stephanie carefully inserted the end of the cotton swab into her nose, trying to find the right place to tickle.
121222211121112.title: Jake really can't move -- tickle yourself, ...

choices: Her sneeze unsticks Jake, who remains in her nose
Her sneeze blows Jake out of her nose
1212222111211121.content:
Stephanie's expression screwed up as she poked around the inside of her nose with the q-tip. It definitely tickled.

"Haaahh ... Aaaahh ..."

"Hey, what are you doing?" Jake shouted from his hopelessly tangled position.

"Ahh... Aaaahhhh..."

"Jake?" said Steph, bringing the tissue up closer to her face. "Where'd you go?"

Suppressing her anger so that she wouldn't squish him, she scooped up her brother in the tissue and crumpled it up.

Jake really wished his sister would calm down, though. She wasn't exactly dancing like a maniac or anything, but the consistent head movements were becoming more than just annoying. As he held onto the blonde hair like reigns upon a bucking bull, Jake was starting to have had enough.

Knowing he wouldn't be able to hold on to the outside of his sister's nose for much longer, he reached up inside her nostril and very gently grabbed onto a blonde nose hair.

The last thing Jake wanted to do right now was trigger a sneeze, so he knew his move was risky, but it was the only way he'd be able to get up into Stephanie's nose for safety. Gulping, Jake released the outside of his sister's nose completely and prayed that her nose hair would support his weight and that he didn't tickle her too much.

Stephanie tried her best to remain inconspicuous as she thought about what to do. She wasn't sure if Natasha was allergic to anything, so there weren't any obvious solutions. Eventually, Steph let out a sigh and resolved to try something a bit on the cliche side. Maybe it wouldn't even work, but it was worth a shot. Putting on a playful smile, she gave Natasha a gentle push on the shoulder and stood up from the couch.

"Wait right here, I'm going to grab some drinks," said Stephanie, skipping off to the kitchen. Natasha was about to follow, but Stephanie left just a little too quickly. Meanwhile, Jake had no idea what was going on. He couldn't see Stephanie's awkward facial expressions, and based only on hearing what she'd been saying, he didn't suspect a thing. Or at least not until Natasha suddenly sniffed hard, scrunching up her nose. Jake was briefly lifted up by the rush of air, and he quickly grabbed onto a nose hair the second he was able to. He hoped that was just a random sniff, but then Natasha did it again, twice this time. The ground below Jake's feet shook violently as Natasha wiggled her nose, and Jake could only pray he wasn't about to be sneezed out a second time...
