Wait. The pepper's still in there, Nat can't hold out forever...
12122221112212122.content:
Natasha sniffed sharply and scrunched her nose as a pungent scent invaded her nostrils, seemingly out of nowhere. It brought along with it a strong tickle, her nostrils flaring involuntarily. The blond girl frowned. It almost smelled... spicy? She knew that strange scent was familiar, but she couldn't quite put her finger on it.

Shrugging, Natasha put it out of her mind... or tried to. The itching in her sinuses was getting really insistent, and she knew wouldn't be able to ignore it for much longer. Not wanting to interrupt the conversation, Natasha wiggled her nose back and forth trying to dislodge whatever was irritating her.

Unfortunately, it wasn't enough. No matter what the did, the sensation gathering in her nose only got stronger, fast approaching critical levels. Finally, she spoke up. "H-hey Steph?" She began breathily, "D-do you smehhhh... smell s-something...?" Her eyes were unfocused, staring into the distance as the sneeze gained momentum.

"No..." Steph replied, to distracted for a more detailed response. She was studying Nat's face carefully, trying make sure she saw where Jake flew when the explosion came. As she watched her friend's eyelids began to flutter, her round nostrils flaring widely. Nat took a deep breath, head tipping back...

...and nothing. "Uhggggg..." Nat groaned, scrubbing furiously at her nose with her wrist. She HATED when that happened. The urge to sneeze had vanished at the last second, but her nose still itched.

"I think there must be something in the air," Nat complained, not noticing Stephanie's frustration. "First you sneeze, then me... well, almost... guh, it's still itchy..." Nat sighed, finally removing her wrist with a quick sniffle. Was this what Beth felt like all the time?"

* * *

Jake groaned as he peeled himself off Natasha's nostril wall. He supposed he should be grateful that he hadn't been sneezed out, but Natasha rubbing her nose like wasn't exactly pleasant either. The fact that Nat's nostril walls were squishy and bent rather than crushing him had prevented serious injury, but he'd definitely be sore in the morning. Hadn't he come to her nose to be safe?

Once the pain faded, though, Jake couldn't help but wonder about Natasha's sudden sneezyness. He didn't think that she was sensitive enough to be set off just by him climbing inside. Almost as soon as he asked the question, he spotted a clue: the countless grey and black objects strewn across Natasha's nasal landscape. They definitely hadn't been there when he came in.

The objects came up to between his ankle and his knee, and in fact looked remarkably like rocks. Given the scale, though, they couldn't be. Jake leaned down to examine one, only to frown at the smell. Pepper? Had Steph brought chips along with the beer or something? And how had it gotten inside Nat's nose? There was some tiny detail that was nagging at the back of his mind...

Jakes blood froze as he remembered it. Pepper. Known for making people sneeze. Hardly daring look, Jake scanned the nostril, confirming his suspicions. The light pink walls of Natasha's nose were deepening to red, mucus beginning to drip down them and pool on the 'ground'. As if to underscore the point, The world around Jake shuddered and Natasha's nostril gave a small twitch. She might not be on the edge of sneezing at the moment, but her nose was definitely not back to normal...

* * *

Meanwhile. Stephanie's eye twitched in frustration as she saw Natasha's sneeze vanish at the last moment She had been *so close*. Well, there was nothing else for it, she needed to get Jake out of there. Who knew what he was getting up to in there...

What does Stephanie do next?
12122221112212122.title: False start

choices: Jake managed to stay in Natasha's nose
121222211122121221.content:
Starting to lose her patience, Stephanie returned to the front of the couch and sat down next to her friend. She wasn't sure what she was going to do yet, but she was definitely going to do something. Unfortunately, after glancing around the room, there wasn't anything Steph could find that would be useful without also being too obvious. As mad as she was at Jake, she didn't want Natasha to be mad at her too.

Stephanie suddenly had an idea. She looked down at her hand, and there was still the tiniest amount of pepper left on her fingertips. It probably wasn't enough to do anything significant, but it was worth a shot. Steph watched Natasha sniff and wrinkle her nose for a few more seconds, and then she lifted her finger and placed it firmly under her friend's nose.

"Here, let me help," Stephanie said with a giggle, hoping Natasha would just think she was messing around. She turned her finger over, placing the peppery spot right underneath Natasha's left nostril. Stephanie watched as Natasha immediately clenched her eyes shut and sniffed. It was working! Better yet, if Natasha did sneeze, Jake might get blown right onto her finger...

"Steph, I..." wheezed Natasha, prompting Stephanie to smile. "I'm... I'm gonna..."

Stephanie's eyes widened in anticipation as Natasha took a deep breath, and then...

"Choo!"

Natasha let out a little sneeze, her head barely bobbing forward. Jake stumbled forward, but compared to Steph's sneeze, that was nothing. Little did he know, however, that Natasha was only getting started.

"Heh! Hn-Choo! Choo! Ha-Choo! Ih-Choo! Choo! CHOOO!"

Stephanie could feel the spray of Natasha's sneezes on her finger, each one a little bigger than the last, but she didn't care. Her plan had been a success, and she was about to have Jake back in the palm of her hand, almost literally. She smiled as Natasha gasped for breath and then gave a final, big "Ah-CHOOOO!!!" that left her feeling defeated and out of breath. Stephanie quickly removed her finger from under her friend's nose and stared down at it.

"Gesundheit," said Steph, barely paying attention to Natasha anymore. With any luck, Jake would be right in front of her...
121222211122121221.title: Try to make Natasha sneeze again!

choices: She sneezes Jake into the jar just in time
She runs into Brianna or Veronica along the way...
1212222111221212211.content:
Stephanie grinned as she saw Jake, looking almost insect-like as in struggled inside a glob of snot on her finger. She quickly did her best to dampen the expression when she remember Natasha was watching, though. Not that it would have lasted long anyway. She had Jake now, but what was she going to do with him? She couldn't leave him where one of her guests might see him, but at the same time she couldn't put him anywhere he could escape.

Stephanie sighed. There was nothing for it. At least she'd done done it before...

Making sure Natasha was watching, Stephanie made a show of rubbing her forefinger back and forth under her own nose. "Geez, I think you were right..." She whined "I'm feeling kinda itchy too..." Steph did her best to wiggle her nose, trying to make it look irritated. Then she gave a strong sniff, nostrils flaring, hopefully sucking Jake far enough back that he won't be able get out again quickly.

"Ugh, sorry," Steph said to Nat, preparing to get up. "I'll go get us some tissues. There's just one tiny little thing I need to go take care of first..."

* * *

Jake landed hard in an area unlike the rest of Steph's nose he had seen so far. There were no nose-hairs this far back, only smooth pink flesh and glistening snot structures that hung like brides between the two walls of the massive organic cavern. The light from Stephanie's distant nostril was a dim and defuse, barely enough for Jake to see his hand in front of his face.

Speaking of hands, Jake used one to rub the back of his head. "Owwww.... Steph's got some lungs, apparently." Thank goodness her nasal walls weren't hard. Although... what had she been doing? Had she not realized he was on her her finger?

Jake began to survey his surroundings, but he froze when he head Stephanie's voice echo through the chambers inside her head. 'One tiny thing'... Yeah, she definitely knew he was here. And from her tone of voice, she wasn't planning anything nice. Jake began to sweat. Screw the risks of being sneezed out, he needed to get of this nose now!

* * *

Stephanie's nose twitched involuntarily as she walked down the hallway, a sharp prickle starting up way back in her sinuses. Man Jake worked fast... unless there had been some pepper left on her finger. She hadn't thought of that. Either way, she needed to hurry. There was a jar with some holes poked in the lid in the kitchen, she could put Jake there until the party was over. She'd apologize afterwards. She just needed to get there before the ticking clock in her nose hit zero. Stephanie's nostrils flared, her eyes starting to water.

"ehhh... h-hihh..."



Does Steph make it?
1212222111221212211.title: In Transit

choices: Steph returns with another shrunken partygoer
12122221112212122111.content:
Stephanie walked slowly, carefully, and above all casually away from Natasha, doing her best to not let her friend see that anything was wrong. Her face, hidden from the girl behind her, had the expression of someone teetering dangerously on the edge of a sneeze, barely holding on. She bit her lip, wiggling her freckled nose back and forth in a desperate attempt to alleviate the urgent itch building inside it.

The moment she was out of sight, Steph book into a run, clamping one hand over her nostrils. She was so close, the doorway to the kitchen was right int from of her, but she didn't know if she could make it that far. Her nose was sending itchy, irritated signals to her brain stronger than ever, and no matter how hard she tried Steph couldn't stop her body from responding. She felt herself take a deep breath, then another as her lungs filled up, preparing to blast her annoying sibling from her nasal cavity. She was in from of the cupboards now but she couldn't see, her eyes were fluttering shut and filling with tears...

Faintly Stephanie heard Jake laughing inside her head, taunting her. She gritted her teeth and tried to hold back just a little longer, she couldn't loose this! "S-shut uhhH... up! Y-you're nahhHH! n-not escaping this tihhh... t-tehhHHhhHHHH...!"

Inside his sister's head, Jake grinned. Steph was about to about to blow, no matter what she said. She couldn't even finish the sentence! The pink slimy wall beside him was stolen and throbbing, bright red with irritation as he raked his fingernails across it, as well as giving the hypersensitive membrane the occasional kick. A sudden gust of wind nearly blew Jake off his feet as Steph's chest expanded, taking in air. This was going to be a wild ride...

"hheeEEHHhhHHHH... HAAHHhhhHHH-!! KATCCHHHHEEEEWW!!!!"

Jake whooped as her felt throughout the air to freedom... only to land hard, far earlier than he expected. Where was he? He could still see the kitchen floor far below him, almost like this strange surface was made of... glass...

Jake twisted around, only to see Steph's face hovering close above him, just past the mouth of what he now recognized an an immense glass jar. She wasn't gloating, though. Steph's eyes were still squeezed tight shut, pink nostrils flaring in and out. She was going to....

"huTSHEEW!!"

Jake cringed as he was showered in moisture as Steph sneezed again. He glared at the giant girl as she sniffed, rubbed her nose, and finally opened her eyes to look down at her tiny captive. Stephanie grinned. "Sorry Jake, but did you really think I didn't realize you'd be a able to... make... me... onesec..." Stephanie turned and sneeze a final he-TCHHH!! over her shoulder, making the jar wobble. She laughed.

"...make me sneeze. Wow Jake, you really did a number on my nose. Shame you couldn't do it faster, but hey." She shrugged. Stephanie grabbed a lid with air holes and screwed in into place before reaching up to put the jar on a high shelf. "Now just sit tight in here, okay? We can talk more about all this once that party's over."
12122221112212122111.title: Trapped!

choices: Stephanie manages to hold in her sneeze
12122221112212122112.content:
Turning a corner, Stephanie nearly collided with one of her guests. She gave a yelp and stepped back, and for a fleeting moment she felt relieved that the shock had startled the sneeze out of her, at least for now.

"Hi, Steph!" said the other girl, not at all bothered by nearly being trampled. That was Brianna in a nutshell: always happy, even if it didn't make much sense.

"H-hey, Brianna," Stephanie replied. Her urge to sneeze had died down, but she still felt a pretty potent tickle in her nose. No longer caring if anyone noticed, Stephanie reached a finger up to her nostrils and rubbed back and forth underneath. That dulled the tickle enough for her to ignore it, but she knew it would be back sooner or later. Turning her attention back to Brianna, Stephanie was a bit surprised to see the energetic girl simply staring at her with a smile.

"D-do you need something?" asked Steph, oblivious to how rude that might have sounded. Brianna shrugged and rolled her eyes.

"Nah, I just wanna hang out!" she responded, earning an awkward smile from her host.

"Well, I... Ehh... Hihhh..."

Upon hearing Brianna's voice, Jake began to tickle Steph's nose even more vigorously. Brianna might have been weird and hyper, but she was definitely higher on the list of people Jake would rather be stuck with. Then again, when three of the other choices consisted of a girl who hated him for no reason, his sister, and his sister's right-hand woman, that wasn't a high bar to clear. In any case, getting sneezed onto Brianna was surely preferable to whatever Stephanie had in store for him. Luckily for him, he was so far back inside Steph's nose that he barely had to do anything to irritate her. In fact, simply running back and forth seemed to do the trick...
12122221112212122112.title: She runs into Brianna along the way...

121222211122121221121.content:
"I-I... Uh.... h-heh.. hahHHH...!"

Stephanie trailed off as she struggled to contain her worsening need to sneeze. What ever Jake was doing, it was working, causing a powerful itch back between her eyes. She scrubbed furiously at her nose again, but Jake was too far back, out of her reach.

Steph's eyes crossed as she stared at the offending organ, trying to will the tickle out of existence. Her face went red with effort as the tried to control her body, stopping it from expelling Jake, but it was no use. All the social butterfly's body knew was that some foreign object had gotten to somewhere it definitely didn't belong, and it needed to be removed by any mean necessary. Stephanie held her breath, her cheeks puffing out in a last ditch attempt to halt the burgeoning reflex, but the frantic itching in her nasal cavity signaled that it would't be delayed for long.

Sure enough, Stephanie only lasted a few seconds before her breath escaped in a huff. Her head tilted back with a small gasp, nostrils flaring massively. The giant girl's lips trembled as familiar sounds began to come from her mouth...

"A-ahh... HihhHH...! h-HEHhh...! hUHH-!"

Brianna might have been oblivious sometimes, but she definitely noticed THIS. In a couple more seconds she would have put it together, but for the moment all she realized was that her friend was making a strange face and weird noises. Oblivious to what was about to happen, an expression of concern spread across Brianna's face. She peered at her distressed friend, unknowingly placing herself directly in the line of fire. "Steph, are you alri—"

"HUTSHHEEEW!!I"

Jake curled into a little a ball Steph sneezed directly into Brianna's face, placing his arms over his head. Maybe he had tickled her a bit too much. Still, there was no time for that as the gale force winds blasted him out of one nostril amidst a could of glittering droplets. As the freckled pink wall of his sister's friend approached, Jake could only hope he landed somewhere soft...
121222211122121221121.title: Jumping ship

choices: Yes, Steph fights back the tickle
No, Steph has a sneezing fit
1212222111221212211211.content:
AAAAAAAAIIIIIEEEEEEEE ROLL ROLL ROLL THUMP

Jake tumbled to a stop on a spongy, slightly inclined surface. It was warm. Even with his eyes closed, Jake had a horrible feeling he knew exactly what he was lying on. Opening his eyes, he got a view that was rapidly becoming way to familiar: Human skin viewed from really, really close up. Wonderful. Now where on the body was he?

Uncurling from a ball, Jake saw the tremendous brown globes of Brianna’s eyes hanging above him, currently opened wide in shock. He was standing on the tip of her thankfully upturned nose. What was it with him and noses, it had all started with— STEPH!

Jake whirled around to see his sister stating facing Brianna, her eyes still closed as she tried to fight off another sneeze. This… was bad. Steph was standing close to Brianna, and Jake was conveniently located exactly at her eye level. The moment she opened her eyes he’d be spotted. He had to find somewhere to hide, fast!

Hastily Jake slid down the slope of Brianna’s nose to where it met her cheek, and then began the arduous climb around to the nostril. Sweat prickled on his back as he climbed as fast as he dared, trying not to think about the drop. In the distance he heard Steph struggling with the tickle that was the only reason she hadn’t opened her eyes yet, but that could change any second…

Is Jake spotted?
1212222111221212211211.title: Brianna's nose

12122221112212122112112.content:
"Ah... Ah-Ahh-Ahhh! AH-CHEEEW!"

Jake couldn't help but stop and watch as Stephanie let out another sneeze. It still seemed huge from his tiny vantage point, but luckily Brianna's face was far enough away to keep him out of reach. Deciding not to waste any more time, Jake continued on as Stephanie suffered through the rest of her sneezing fit. It wasn't easy, but Jake managed to swing himself into the opening of Brianna's nostril just as Steph sneezed again. Before taking any time to look around, Jake laid down at the edge of the nostril and peeked outside. Brianna's nose was upturned enough for Jake to see Stephanie's lower body, and since he couldn't see her face, he hoped that meant she wouldn't be able to see him either.

"Whoa," Brianna giggled, amused by her friend's continued sneezing. "Gesundheit, Steph. You know, you can squeeze your nose to hold the sneezes in. That's what I do. Like this..."

Before Jake could realize what Brianna was saying, the opening of the nostril suddenly closed up around him as Brianna pinched her nose between her thumb and forefinger. He was small enough that being squeezed by Brianna's soft skin didn't hurt, but he could barely breathe and he couldn't move at all. Luckily it didn't last long, and Brianna quickly released her nose. She giggled again, hoping Stephanie might take her suggestion, but the other girl simply groaned and stomped out of the room.
12122221112212122112112.title: No, Steph has a sneezing fit

choices: Yes, he accidentally tickles Brianna's nose slightly
121222211122121221121121.content:
"Hey, wait up!" Brianna cried.

Steph fumed as she sulked into the kitchen. Why did her nose have to be so darn sensitive?? She had practically had Jake in the palm of her hand, and now he could be anywhere just because of a few lousy sneezes! Why couldn't she have held them in? He could be anywhere by now, and at his size there was no way she'd be able to spot him unless he was literally in her face. As she'd even know where to look for him in the first place... at the beginning he tried to invade her nose of all places! And then he was in Natasha's nose...

Stephanie stopped in her tracks. Noses. He had already headed straight for two already... was that a pattern? She couldn't think of any reason why her brother would want to be inside girl's nostrils, but he had already done it twice already. Could he be hiding inside Brianna's? Stephanie turned around and leaned in close to her friend's face, examining it in minute detail.

"Um, Steph?" Brianna asked, taken aback. "Is something wrong?"

"No, you just look different today..." Steph lied, not leaving Brianna's personal space. "Did you change you makeup?"

"No..."

Stephanie watched her friend's freckly, upturned nose like a hawk, alert for the tiniest twitch of the nostrils, the smallest scrunch, anything that might be a sign of a nose tickle caused by a shrunken invader...




Does Jake give himself away?
121222211122121221121121.title: Brianna follows Stephanie

1212222111221212211211211.content:
Noticing that Steph was still in the room, Jake quickly ducked into the miniature forest of Brianna's nose hairs, hiding from view. He didn't think that Steph would think to look up Brianna's nose for him, but better safe than sorry, right?

Ironically, though, Jake's attempt at stealth was the thing that ended up giving him away. Although the collection of tiny hairs inside Brianna's nostril looked like a forest from his perspective, they weren't really a forest. As Jake relaxed a little and leaned against a nearby 'tree', the nose hair bent under his weight in a decidedly un-tree-like fashion. Before Jake could realize what was going on, the tip of the bending hair poked into the sensitive inner wall of Brianna's nostril, then skittered ticklishly across it as the hair bent further...

Brianna's nostril twitched. A moment later she gave a tiny sniff, not even consciously aware of the small tickle in her left nostril. It would have gone almost completely unnoticed in any normal conversation, but under Stephanie's laser-like gaze it was as good as a flashing neon sign saying 'Jake in residence.'

"Oh, it must have been my imagination. Sorry!" Immediately Steph pulled back, all smiles and apologies. Behind her cheerful facade, though, her brain was working at a million miles an hour. Could she get Brianna to sneeze Jake out? That hadn't exactly worked so great last time... they were in the kitchen, maybe she could get her to sneeze him into a jar or something? It wasn't a good plan, but what was the alternative, just telling her? Granted, if there was anyone who would take "I shrunk my brother to a quarter inch tall and he's hiding up your nose" in stride, it would be Bri... but if she didn't Steph really didn't want her friends to think she was crazy either...




Ultimately, Steph decided to...
1212222111221212211211211.title: Given away

choices: Jake is sneezed into the pepper-filled pot
12122221112212122112112111.content:
"Meh, telling her everything can always be plan B ... this is worth a shot," Stephanie reasoned in her head.

"Hey, Bri," she started out loud. "Help me carry some of these things down to the cellar? I have to make room for more beer to bring up."

"Sure, Steph," Bri acquiesced, moving over to her friend, who was grabbing some pots and pans off the kitchen counter.

"Great, thanks!" said Steph. It was by no means a great plan, but Stephanie tried her best to sell it casually so Brianna wouldn't find it unusual or really think much about it at all. "Here, you can take this ... and these," she continued, handing Bri a pot and some small jars from the cupboard.

"Hmmm ... and I guess I'd might as well empty these while I'm at it. They're getting low," she stated cooly, unscrewing the caps of her salt and pepper shakers in the cupboard. It didn't really make sense, but, again, Stephanie hoped that Brianna wouldn't pick up on the peculiarity of the situation.

Stephanie gave the open pepper shaker a small sniff to check it was still potent. Instantly her eyes watered a little and she wrinkled her nose, suppressing the urge to sneeze. Yup, this should work.

"Here, I'll just put this in here," she went on casually, turning to Bri and dumping the contents of the salt shaker into one of the jars Bri was holding. Then, she rather violently shook the contents of the pepper shaker into the other jar Brianna held closer to her face. "And this can go here," she grinned slightly.

"Whoa!" Bri giggled as Stephanie shook the pepper into the jar, involtarily grimacing as some flakes flew up to her face. "Careful," she warned. "You don't want me sneezing on your kitchenware!"

Jake froze when he heard that. Stephanie grinned, for that was exactly what she hoped for. "Hmm, good point. Hold on, though, a bit more," she declared tapping the bottom of the nearly-empty pepper shaker, sending a puff of spice mostly into the jar and partly into Brianna's face.

Brianna's eyes watered a little from that. "Whoa, no, r-really, Steph," she stammered, shutting her eyes and flaring her nostrils. "I think I -- haaah -- I think I might -- haaaaah --"

"Might what, Bri?" Stephanie smiled, as her friend's nostrils flared wider.

"AA-CHOOO!" Bri erupted, much to Stephanie's amusement.
12122221112212122112112111.title: Make Brianna sneeze him out

choices: No, but Jake's in trouble: her nose is starting to run.
Yes, she can't hold out any longer.
121222211122121222.content:
Stephanie nodded and 'uh-hu'd as Natasha launched into a story about a girl in her class, but in truth the words were going in in one ear and out the other. Whenever she thought she wasn't looking, Steph snuck glances at her friend's small triangular nose as it slowly turned pink.

At first she had thought the color was her imagination, but by now it was a bright shade, nearly red from irritation. Every few words Nat would crinkle her nose in irritation, nostrils twitching. Sometimes she'd scrunch it to the left or right instead, or sniff, but it was clearly something she couldn't help doing.

Twice now Steph had wanted to scream at her for swiping at her enflamed nostrils with a knuckle. Didn't she know that every time she tired to alleviate her itchiness it delayed her sneeze?! It was torture! The girl's nose was clearly an itchy mess, but still she just. wouldn't. sneeze! No matter how hard or how often Stephanie mentally urged her to do exactly that.

On the edge of her seat, Steph waited for the first hitched word or glazed look in her BFF's eyes that would indicate the explosion she was waiting for. Patience, she reminded herself, she had to be patient...

Does Natasha sneeze?
121222211122121222.title: Waiting....

choices: Jake tries to provoke a sneeze
1212222111221212221.content:
Natasha sniffled uncomfortably, keenly feeling the awkwardness of the situation. The itching in her nose had backed off to a level where she was pretty sure she wasn't going to sneeze, although it was still pretty uncomfortable. Unfortunately, her nose was responding to the irritation in other ways.

Natasha's sinuses sinuses reached to the harsh pepper gains by trying to wash them away, and as a result her nose was getting rather, well... full. Very full, if she was being honest with herself.

*Snlllllllllrk*

She sniffled wetly again, blushing at the wet sound. She had to keep sniffling everything back up inside, or it would start to drip out onto her lip. She knew she ought to blow her nose, but she hadn't brought any tissues, and... well, as irrational as it was, she didn't want to admit anything was wrong. She was enjoying her conversation with Steph, and getting up to get some would interrupt it. More to the point, it would mean letting her friend know that she had a nose full of snot. Even if she probably already knew...

* * *

Meanwhile inside her nose, Jake frantically scrambled for higher ground. Mucus poured off of the walls of Natasha's nostril, now red and swollen with irritation, as they frantically tried to flood away the stinging spices coating them. It could almost be called beautiful, a gushing, slow-motion waterfall made of molasses, but Jake was in no state to appreciate it. What had started out as pools of mucus had rapidly become a river, then a flood, and then an ocean of snot. A roaring gale sent crashing waves back from the nostril with every sniff as Natasha struggled to keep the ocean hidden.

Jake tired to keep from panicking as he surveyed his surroundings. He'd finally reaching some flat ground, but there wasn’t much of it left around the base of the nose’s steep walls, and the ocean only kept getting higher. At this rate he’d drown soon! Even a sneeze would be an improvement…
1212222111221212221.title: A Snotty Situation

choices: Head to the piercing in Stephanie's right nostril.
1212222111222.content:
Jake screamed as air rushed past his body at a hundreds of miles per hour, his sister's body doing its best to expel the annoying irritant that was bothering it. The force of the wind knocked him off your feet, clinging to the nose hair that got him into this mess in the first place. It was like a hurricane as the force of Steph's sneeze ripped at Jake's hair and clothes, nearly dragging him out of her body. He'd never felt so scared in your life, never felt so... exhilarated?

Yes, even as he quite rightfully feared for his life, Jake couldn't help but enjoy the way the adrenaline sang and crackled in his veins as he tested himself against his own personal wind tunnel. He'd always been a thrill seeker (Steph had always said he's get himself killed one day,) and while this was stupidly terrifying, it was also stupidly awesome. Shrill, hysterical laughter began to sneak it's way between his screams as Jake's knuckles whitened around the nose hair that was the only thing standing between him and a date with a drop he did NOT want to find out if he could survive.

Then, as suddenly as it began, the sneeze ended. In the outside world, the two girls stood staring at each other for a frozen moment, before Natasha broke the silence.

"Ohmygod Steph, EWWWW!" She squeaked, frantically searching through her bag for a tissues to wipe off the spray she could feel misting her face. "Cover your mouth next time!"

"I-I'm sorry." Steph apologized, feeling heat begin to rise in her cheeks. She couldn't believe she'd just sneezed directly into her best friend's face. "I didn't... *sniff* It just snuck up on me" She offered lamely, knowing it was a lie. The truth was, she had been to distracting thinking about Jake to remember to turn away or cover her mouth. Her expression darkened. A certain too-mischievous-for-his-own-good brother was going to regret this...

Meanwhile, Jake was busy laughing his ass off inside her nostril. Part of it was the massive adrenaline high, but a good chunk came just from hearing the bewildered, embarrassed tone in his sister's voice. Stephanie was so rarely truly caught off guard or embarrassed, this was the perfect from of revenge. Just knowing that she wasn't in full control of her body anymore had to be driving her up the wall. Oh yes, there'd be a lot more where that came from if her had anything to say about it...

Still, I should probably find a way to do this more safely... Jake thought. He thought he had an idea of how far he could go without triggering a sneeze now, but he wasn't exactly inclined to bet his life on his theory. As fun as surviving the windstorm had been, the sensible part of him knew it wasn't a good idea to try to repeat the experience. He needed a way to survive a sneeze reliably...
1212222111222.title: Adrenaline Junky

choices: Steph goes to punish Jake, not realizing that the balance of power has shifted
The doorbell rings, and Steph goes to greet the newly arrived girls
12122221112221.content:
After a few moment's thought, Jake came up with a possible solution. Simply holding on to something was a decent plan in theory, he just needed to find something sturdier than a thin and slippery hair that waved in the wind of a sneeze almost as much as he did. His sister's left nostril had nothing of the sort, but she had gotten a small stud in the right one a couple years ago. He just needed to get over there.

Not wanting to tickle Steph's nose any further, Jake slowly tiptoed over to the edge of her nostril, sitting down and dangling his legs over the edge.

He made the mistake of looking down.

Jake had never thought of himself as the type to be scared of heights, but even he felt a wave of vertigo strong enough to make him close his eyes. At this scale, Stephanie's body didn't even look like a person anymore, just a sheer, endless cliff of fabric and pink that he had to keep reminding himself was actually skin. Up till now he had thought of himself as tiny rather than everything else as large, but now the whole affair flipped into a terrifying new perspective. Exactly how many miles up was he, relative to his size?

Before he could think too hard about what he was doing, Jake slid down onto Steph's upper lip. Don't look down, don't look down... Instead, Jake did his best to look outwards as he slowly shuffled along his sister's upper lip.

Right in time to see Natasha look up from wiping her face. Jake could see an expression of mixed shock and disgust move across the giant girl's face as her eyes locked onto him.

"Um, Steph...?" She began hesitantly, gesturing in the vague direction of her upper lip "You've got a little, uh, you know..."

Stephanie clapped her hands over her nose and mouth, cheeks burning even brighter in humiliation. As flustered as she was, it didn't even occur to her that the booger Nat had spotted might be her brother. All that crossed her mind was that she had snot hanging out of her nose for all the world to see. "I-I, uh, I've gotta..." Stephanie stuttered out, before turning tail and fleeing in search of a tissue.

Meanwhile, Jake pulled himself up into her right nostril, heart still pounding. Having two building-sized palms slam to a halt mere feet (from his perspective) from his face was a bit of a shock, to put it lightly. Still, at least now he was within sight of his goal. Seen on this scale, the inner end of Stephanie's piercing looked like a small radio tower jutting out from the wall, or maybe some massive work of abstract art. Jake sighed with relief. It was the kind that came in two parts, and the inner half had some very convenient loops as part of its structure. Jake took off his belt and threaded it through one of the loops, effectively lashing himself to the large metal anchor. The shrunken sibling grinned. He'd like to see Steph sneeze him out NOW. And now that he could tickle with impunity...
12122221112221.title: You've got a little something...

121222211122211.content:
Stephanie marched off to the bathroom, anger and embarassment flooding through her. Locking the door behind her, she grabbed some tissue paper and stood in front of the mirror, pushing her nose up at the tip with her index finger to expose her nostrils. She scanned them for her brother, but wasn't able to spot the tiny troublemaker.

"Jake!" she hissed between her teeth. "What the hell is your problem? Jake!"

"Oh, what's that, sis?" Jake answered sarcastically. He hadn't begun to tickle her again just yet; he had realized that she was upset and planning something, so he figured he would toy with his sister first. "Are you not happy anymore having me inside your nose?"

"No, you jerk!" was the reply he earned. "You just made me sneeze all over my best friend! Now get the hell out of there or else! I warned you to behave yourself."

"Hmm," Jake began. "Get the hell out or else ... what? You'll sneeze and blow me out of here?" he mocked, pulling the nearest nose hair toward him and letting go. It swung back and forth like a tree branch. "I don't know, Steph, I don't really find your argument that compelling. If I do recall, you already sneezed less than five minutes ago and -- well, I'm still here."

Stephanie realized that, although she had no earthly idea how her brother had pulled off that feat. She wasn't going to give in to him: "Well, you just got lucky! I'll just -- I'll just keep sneezing until you're out of there!" she threatened.

"I did get lucky the first time, I can admit that. But I don't need luck any more," Jake proclaimed, holding proudly onto the belt tying him to his sister's nose piercing.

Stephanie had no idea what her brother was talking about. "Whatever, your luck just ran out, you little pain. I don't have time for your games!" she said, pushing her nose up again to look for Jake, who she hadn't actually found yet.

"Go ahead, do your worst!" Jake called her bluff. He was ready to have some fun with this, now that he was sure Stephanie couldn't launch him from her nose. "What, are you gonna go get that ridiculous pink feather again? Or am I just gonna have to do all the work for you?" he teased again, shaking the blonde nose hair near him up and down.

Stephanie could feel that disturbance inside her nostril. Seriously, what the hell is his problem? Is he actually gonna try to make me sneeze again? "You're crazy!" she sniffed, rubbing a finger under her nostrils. She was starting to get genuinely upset that she no longer seemed to be able to intimidate her brother. He had some sort of new wave of confidence that was beginning to irritate her. Moreover, it was a little embarassing that Jake was flaunting more power over her nose than she had.

"I could," Stephanie said, referring to retrieving the feather. "Or I might not even need it." She rummaged through the bathroom and found a q-tip. "I think this would work, too," she warned, trying her best to scare Jake, but the feeble attempt was unsuccessful.

Jake yawned. "Well, go ahead! Bet I can beat you to it," he said, lazily swishing the same nose hair near him again.

His sister wrinkled her nose up in response. "Stop!" she whined, embarassed again by the fact that she knew he was right. "That tickles!"

"Yeah, no kidding," said Jake, unphased. "So are you gonna make yourself sneeze or what?" He impatiently continued to play with the nose hair. His sister snorted, blowing Jake off balance, but his belt kept him securely anchored. He grinned.
121222211122211.title: Power shift

choices: Jake and Stephanie continue their battle
1212222111222112.content:
By the time Stephanie inserted the tip of the cotton swab into her nose, Jake was already hard at work. He threw all of his weight against the nearest nose hair, causing it to sway from side to side. After building up some momentum, he managed to bend the hair far enough that it bumped against a second hair. It seemed like that was too much for Steph to bare.

Jake smirked as his sister gasped for breath. She lost her grip on the q-tip, causing it to fall straight out of her nose, and she began frantically waving one hand up and down in front of her face. The tickle in her nose was already strong enough to make her eyes water, and that was the last thing she became aware of before completely losing herself to the urge to sneeze.

"Ah... Aah... Aaaah..." Stephanie wheezed, her head tipping back with each breath. Jake was confident in the strength of his belt, but he stopped tickling and held on to Steph's nose ring just in case...

"AHH-CHHEEEEW!!!"

Stephanie doubled over with the force of her sneeze. It was even bigger than the one she had let out all over Natasha, and both she and Jake could feel it. The powerful gust of air picked Jake up and caused him to flail around like a tree in a hurricane, but he remained securely fastened to the nose ring. He did feel a bit wetter after the sneeze was over, but he was still in decent shape and he hadn't been blown out, so he still considered it a victory.

Meanwhile, Steph wasn't so lucky.She firmly rubbed her finger back and forth under her still-tickly nose, and after she opened her eyes, her face turned bright red when she looked up at the mirror. A few boogers had splattered in the middle of the reflective surface, obviously blown out by her sneeze. Biting her bottom lip, Stephanie let out an embarrassed whine and began to wipe the mirror clean with a tissue.
1212222111222112.title: Jake makes her sneeze first

choices: Stephanie sends herself into a massive sneezing fit.
12122221112221121.content:
Jake couldn't help but laugh as he saw his sister's reflection through her nostril. "Pffffhahaha! What's the matter Lil sis, embarrassed by a few boogers? The view's a lot worse in here!"

Stephanie scowled at that, her cheeks turning pink in embarrassment as she wiped off the mirror. "Shut it you creep! I'm gonna sneeze you out of there eventually!" She didn't know exactly what he was doing to keep himself from getting blown out, but she was not going to loose to him damn it!

"Oh really?" Jake drawled, smirking. He supposed it was possible that she might be able to do it eventually, but he was almost certain she hadn't thought this through. "And what are you going to do when you come out the bathroom twenty minutes later looking like Beth in the middle of a field ragweed? Say you came down with a cold really, really fast?

Stephanie hesitated as she pictured herself trying to continue the party with a bright red nose and puffy eyes, both dripping constantly. Still if the other choice was sneezing all over her friends... "I-If I have to!"

Stooping, Stephanie picked up the, Q-tip holding it menacingly in front of her left nostril. With her other hand she gathered a lock of her hair, wetting it in her mouth to give it a point. She took a deep breath, mentally preparing. Was she really going to do this?
12122221112221121.title: Tensions escalate...

121222211122211212.content:
"...You don't have to." Jake muttered quietly.

"Huh?" Stephanie asked, thrown of balance. Was he really giving in? "What are you trying to–"

"I wan't to make a bet!" Jake shouted, his mind racing. He had been all set to try to embarrass Steph as revenge, but... that wasn't his original goal, was it? Sure, messing with her might be satisfying, but... there was a difference between a prank and ruining this party that she had been setting up all week. Besides, even if he could survive her attempts to extract him, he doubted they'd be pleasant. Taking a deep breath, he tried to push his anger and competitiveness aside and think.

"I'm going to set a timer for half an hour!" Jake shouted, pulling his phone out of his pocket. Somehow it was still working, despite it's tiny size. "I'm going to tickle your nose, and if you can keep yourself from sneezing... oh, let's say six times before it's over then I promise I'll behave myself for the rest of your party!"

Jake watched his sister's face carefully in the mirror as he extended his offer. He knew she wanted this, it was just a question of whether she'd take the bait.

"And if I can't?" Stephanie ask, one eyebrow raised. She's pulled her hair and the Q-tip a little ways back from her face though, which Jake took as good sign.

"Then you return me to regular size."

* * *

Does Stephanie take the bet?
121222211122211212.title: The Wager

choices: Jake at least makes it to the front of the nostril
1212222111222112122.content:
"No way!" Stephanie protested. Embarassed, she admitted: "You just made me sneeze once in less than a minute! Six times in a half hour? That's way too easy for you!"

"Well, yeah, I suppose," Jake admitted a little smugly, pushing one of Stephanie's nose hairs again.

His sister sniffed. "Stop that! See what I mean?" she shot back indignantly, rubbing her finger under her nostrils again.

"Okay, so do you have a better bet in mind?" her brother inquired.

Stephanie thought for a moment. She did kind of like the idea of a bet -- if she won, Jake would stop annoying her, but the odds against her certainly had to be more worth her time. "All right," she began. "Since you seem to find it amusing to make me sneeze, my sneezing should not mean you win the bet. No, it's too easy for you anyway, so let's do it like this: You start way, way back in my nose, and you have to make it all the way from there to the tip of my nose in 5 minutes without me sneezing. Sound fair?"

Jake laughed as he considered the offer. "That sounds easy enough! I mean, sure, I can make you sneeze if I want to, but if I don't, well, I just won't."

"Don't get overconfident," Stephanie warned him. "You tickle more than you probably think. And you're gonna have to move pretty fast. Plus I'm not gonna be, like, trying to hold anything back for you. Deal?"

Jake wasn't too phased. "Yeah, fine, deal!" he declared, confident enough in his abilities to not irritate his sister. He undid the belt lash tying him to Stephanie's piercing, and dropped down to the floor of her nostril. "So, are you gonna give me time to get all the way back there? Or--" before Jake could finish his question, Stephanie plugged her left nostril with her finger and sniffed hard. Jake was ripped off his feet and sucked back far into her nose.

"Good lu-uck!" Stephanie sang mockingly. "You got five minutes, bro!"
1212222111222112122.title: Revamping the deal

12122221112221121221.content:
Jake rolled along the squishy ground for a few seconds before finally coming to a stop. He sat up and shook his head, taking a moment to get his bearings. It was dark this far back in Stephanie's nose, but the opening of her nostril shone line a beacon in the distance, so at least Jake knew what direction to go in. After picking himself up, he immediately started to run toward the light.

"Hihh!" Stephanie gasped, and Jake nearly fell as her nose trembled. The light at the end of the tunnel dimmed for a second as Steph rubbed her finger back and forth under her nose again, partially blocking the opening of her nostril.

"Stop it, that tickles," Stephanie complained, prompting Jake to roll his eyes.

"Seriously? I didn't even do anything!" he groaned, gawking in the direction of the light.

"Well, it's not my problem," Stephanie replied, sounding more than a little smug. "Better be careful."

Shrugging in frustration, Jake set off again. This time he walked a bit more slowly, and while Stephanie didn't react, the opening of her nostril was so distant that Jake could hardly tell if he was actually getting closer to it.

"Uh, how long has it been?" asked Jake, annoyed that he even had to ask.

"Almost a minute," answered Steph. Jake slapped a palm to his forehead, and then he increased his pace to a jog.

"You're tickling my nose," Stephanie said again. It wasn't as bad as last time, but she wasn't exactly fond of the sensation in any amount.

"I don't care!" yelled Jake, fighting the urge to break out into a run again.

"You should," Stephanie continued. "It's going to make me sneeze."

"Shut up, Steph!"

Eventually Jake threw caution to the wind and resumed running. Stephanie's nose seemed to be a bit less sensitive here, and the increasingly-dense nose hairs limited how fast he could go anyway. Before long, Jake was about as close to sprinting as he could get, and the opening of Stephanie's nostril was almost in reach.
12122221112221121221.title: Jake at least makes it to the front of the nostril

choices: Jake makes it to the tip
121222211122211212211.content:
Running around as many nose hairs as he could, Jake finally made it to the opening of Stephanie's nostril, where he paused to catch his breath, leaning against the wall of his sister's nose.

Stephanie gave a little sniff and wrinkled her nose, causing Jake to fall back on his rear end. "Hey, easy!" he complained.

"I already told you the rules," Stephanie grinned. "No special treatment from me. You're lucky I didn't sneeze! Well, congrats on making it to the front of my nose ... but you only got, like, two minutes left and the deal was you have to make it to the tip."

Jake groaned. "All right, well can you at least put your head back so I can climb straight up?" Jake bargained.

"Hmm, let me think about that for a bit ... you got about a minute and thirty," his sister responded.

"Are you kidding me? Forget it! I'll do it this way!" an exasperated Jake cried. He was going to have to shimmy his way out to the tip of Stephanie's nose while hugging her septum the whole time to keep from falling straight down. Or perhaps he could monkey-bar across using her nose hairs -- that seemed a little risky.

Jake knelt down and placed a hand gingerly on a nose hair near the opening of the nostril, and tried to reach his other arm outside of the nostril and around to the other one so he could grip Stephanie's septum.

"Careful, Jake. I ... hihhh ... HAAA ..."

Jake froze and shut his eyes when he heard his sister making those sounds. He gripped her nose as hard as he could. "Come on, I barely touched you!" he pleaded.

"Gotcha!" Stephanie laughed, ceasing her inhalations. "I was faking. One minute left!"

"That's not funny, you jerk!" Jake yelled at her as he recovered from his panic. "Stop cheating!"

"Not cheating!" she protested. "No rules against faking a sneeze. You better hope you don't make me sneeze for real, though, because that did really tickle and you better hurry up! You got this," she teased him. "Here, I'll help a little," she offered, tilting her head back a bit so Jake had more of a straight climb upward.

Jake just rolled his eyes and tried to focus his efforts on the task at hand. "Thanks," he muttered.
121222211122211212211.title: Success, for now

1212222111222112122111.content:
Keeping his arms and legs wrapped around Stephanie's septum, Jake began to shimmy upward. Steph's skin was soft enough that he could squeeze it pretty tight for a decent foothold, but once he was halfway up he found himself sliding back down anyway.

"Whoa," Stephanie gasped softly. "That felt weird."

Jake was nearly flung off when Steph wiggled her nose, but by now he knew it was just a waste of time to complain. He decided to try his makeshift ladder idea instead, though that was still a bit tricky. None of Stephanie's nose hairs were quite that close to the openings of her nostrils, and on top of that, his arms and legs could barely reach all the way across her septum even when fully splayed. This time, Jake didn't even make it as far as his first attempt.

Giving up on trying not to make Stephanie sneeze, Jake turned his attention back to just one nostril. Knowing he had no time to lose, he began to climb straight up Steph's nose hairs. He slipped when Stephanie gave a shudder, but that only spurred him on harder.

"Ahh... Haahhh..." Stephanie breathed, genuinely feeling a sneeze coming on. Jake didn't have time to think about whether or not she was faking it, so he just kept going. The final stretch was going to be difficult. Steph's nostrils didn't quite reach all the way to the tip of her nose, so Jake had a bit of bare skin that he needed to traverse. Standing up as tall as he could, Jake reached his hands up toward the tip of the nose, and the instant he felt he had a good grip, he pulled himself up.

"H-hey, you made it," said Steph, noticing the tickle in her nostril suddenly vanish. She crossed her eyes and looked down the bridge of her nose to see Jake sitting on the tip, looking exhausted. Smiling to herself, Stephanie lifted a finger up to her face and rubbed back and forth under her nostrils, nearly knocking Jake off her nose as the tip squished from side to side.

"Steph, come on..." Jake groaned, too tired to raise his voice.

"Hey, you tickled my nose," Stephanie replied, continuing to rub. "Your fault."

"Fine, whatever. What now?"
1212222111222112122111.title: Jake makes it to the tip

choices: Someone's at the bathroom door looking for Steph
12122221112221121221112.content:
"Um, well ..." Stephanie murmured rather uncomfortably, avoiding Jake's gaze.

"The deal was you change me back if I make it to the tip of your nose without making you sneeze. I did that. So, how do you make me normal size again?" Jake asked, growing impatient.

"Well, I -- I didn't really think you'd get that far. At least not at first. I thought for sure you would've made me sneeze!" Stephanie tried to argue.

"Yeah, that's called losing a bet, Steph! Now you have to pay up!" Jake demanded.

"But -- but that's the thing," she stammered, raising her finger again to rub her nostrils, causing Jake to clamp the tip of her nose with his hands and thighs for support. "I -- I really don't know how," she sighed. "All I know is it's not permanent, but I don't have, like, an 'antidote' or anything."

"You've gotta be kidding me," Jake muttered darkly. His sister sounded sincere. "Really? So you're telling me you let me take that bet and you knew damn well that you couldn't deliver? You liar!"

"No, I didn't lie! Well, not really ... I mean, you wouldn't get out of my nose and ... and you originally came up with the deal, I just changed the task, and ..."

"Whatever!" an aggravated Jake yelled. "If you don't have to hold up your end, then I don't either! That means I'm not gonna stop bothering you until your party's over!" He quickly dropped down to Stephanie's upper lip. Though he was growing awfully tired of it, there was really only one place where Jake was free to torture his sister. Looking up the nostrils again looming before him, he kicked her septum in fury.

Stephanie gasped a little. "Ow! Wait ... wait, Jake, I ... hehhh ... I have to get ... hahhhh ... back to my party!"

Jake charged straight back into Stephanie's nose right after he delivered the kick. It was totally worth it to express his anger, but now he had to make a run for her piercing and grab on again in case she sneezed.
12122221112221121221112.title: Stephanie lied

choices: Jake was blown into the tissue
Jake managed to stay in Stephanie's nose
121222211122211212211122.content:
Stephanie scrunched up her face as she felt Jake sprint back into her nose, but before she had time to react properly, a knock came at the door. She nearly jumped out of her skin at the sound, not expecting anyone to interrupt. After taking a deep breath to calm herself, Stephanie placed a hand on her chest and turned to the door.

"Hello?" she answered, trying not to sound worried.

"Oh! There you are, Steph!" came Brianna's voice from the hallway outside. "We've been wondering where you went. Is everything okay?"

"Yeah, I'm fine!" Stephanie replied, wiggling her nose again as she felt Jake rummaging around. She reached a finger up to her nostrils and rubbed back and forth, but she wasn't sure if that would do anything to stop her brother from wreaking havoc.

"I just had to..." Steph trailed off, trying to think of a good excuse. God forbid she'd mention something genuinely bathroom-related...

"I just had to get a tissue!" she said, half as an explanation to Brianna and half as a threat to Jake. Stephanie plucked a tissue from the box next to the sink and brought it up to her nose. To make her point, she gently cradled her nostrils and blew firmly. After blowing her nose for a few good seconds, Stephanie wiped the tissue back and forth under her nostrils and then held it up to examine it.
121222211122211212211122.title: Someone's at the bathroom door

choices: Steph doesn't figure out what Jake is doing yet
Steph figures out what Jake is doing
1212222111222112122111222.content:
"Ugggh," Stephanie moaned in disgust and frustration. The contents of the tissue were just what any person under normal circumstances would expect: all snot, no Jake. How the hell does he keep holding on? Stephanie wondered furiously.

"Oh, okay!" Brianna called from outside the bathroom. "Well, we were gonna play some beer pong outside on the deck. You can meet us there!"

"Sure!" Stephanie called back. "I'll be out in a sec."

Inside Stephanie's nose, Jake had again made his way to his sister's piercing and was holding on tight. Luckily he had reached it before she blew her nose, and although he was now covered in slime yet again, he had fairly easily managed to hold his ground. As long as she doesn't figure out how I'm staying inside, this is perfect, Jake thought.

"Listen, Jake," Stephanie hissed quietly at her brother. "I don't know yet how you're staying inside my nose, but I'm gonna figure it out, and then your little games are over!"

Jake mock-yawned. "Well, good luck with that, sis. Lemme know when you figure it out, okay?"

Stephanie flared her nostrils in anger. "I'm going outside to play beer pong. Don't even think about messing with me."

"Messing with you?" Jake asked, faking being defensive. "You mean like this?" He swatted at a nose hair hanging down from above him.

Stephanie's eyes shut and she gave a big sniff in response. "Yes!" she whined, fighting back the urge to sneeze.

"Oh, okay, I just wanted to be clear. Well, I don't know, Steph, you did break our bet and I'm still a little upset with you."

Stephanie rolled her eyes and put her hand on the bathroom door handle. She paused for a moment. Seriously, how does he have so much control? she pondered again.
1212222111222112122111222.title: Jake managed to stay in Stephanie's nose

choices: Stephanie is able to finish the game
12122221112221121221112221.content:
Feeling a bit devious, Jake decided to wait until his sister had settled back in with her friends before making his next move. When Stephanie returned to the living room, Veronica was in the middle of a round of beer pong with Natasha. Once they finished, Stephanie stepped up to face Brianna. Brianna went first, missing her first toss. Then, once Jake was fairly sure that Stephanie was about to make her throw, he struck.

Reaching out as far as his belt would let him, Jake gave one of Stephanie's nose hairs a kick. It swayed back and forth, and from the rumbling all around, Jake could tell Steph had wrinkled her nose. Once the nose hair swayed back to him again, he kicked it a second time. The hair bent farther away, and this time it even reached far enough to hit another hair on the other side of the nose. That had worked fairly well last time, so Jake hoped it would have a similar effect.

"Ahh... Haahh..." Stephanie breathed, feeling a sneeze coming on. She rubbed a finger back and forth under her nose, nearly dropping the ping pong ball from her other hand. For better or worse, she didn't have long to think about it before...

"Ah-CHEEEW!"

"Whoa! Bless you, Steph!" giggled Brianna. "Still got a case of the sneezes, huh?"

"Yeah, I guess so," Stephanie grumbled, rubbing her nose again. After a few more rubs, she firmly pressed her nostrils up with the side of her finger, hoping that would at least jostle Jake around a bit. Steph took her toss, and she also missed. All the while she could feel another tickle building up in her nose, but only time would tell how bad it would get.
12122221112221121221112221.title: Steph doesn't figure out what Jake is doing

choices: Steph sneezes Jake into her hand
Jake is blasted somewhere in the bathroom...
1212222111222112122112.content:
Jake stuck his tongue out of the order of his mouth in concentration as he gingerly pulled himself onto a higher nose hair. It was delicate, dangerous work, and he knew doing it tickled, but he thought he was getting the hand of it. Every time he shifted his weight to a new hair Steph's nose would tremble slightly, and he would carefully wait for it to settle down before moving on. Out of the corner of his eye he kept an eye on her expression in the bathroom mirror. It was pretty comical at the moment actually, with her staring at her nose crosseyed and biting her lip. Still, it was worth watching out for signs of an approaching sneeze that wouldn't be visible from the nose, like fluttering eyelids.

Jake smiled as he pulled himself higher. For the first time since starting this bet, he was confident he could pull it off. He felt Steph's nose twitching under his hands, but as long as he was careful to not tickle her that extra little bit he could make it to the tip.

Which, of course, was when everything went wrong.

Jake frowned as a shadow fell across him. For a moment he thought it was just a cloud passing in from of the sun, before he remembered that the alien landscape of his sister's nose was still indoors. When he twisted around to to look, the thing floating between him and the celling light did indeed look like a gross parody of a cloud. It looked like a tangled, fluffy mass of fibers and particles, all slate grey. Several more hovered behind it, seemingly without support. It took Jake a few moments to process what he was seeing. They looked huge because of his size, but he was looking at several flecks of dust floating through the air just outside Steph's nostril.

Jake ran through that sentence again in his head. His eyes widened. "Wait, Steph, don't-!"

But it was too late. Jake watched in horror as the specks of dust disappeared into the depth of Steph's nose, sucked up as she inhaled.

For a moment there was silence.

Then Jake saw Steph's expression in the mirror. Her mouth had gone slack, and her eyelids began to droop. The nostril shook and then stretched, nose hairs moving away from each other as the massive structure flared.

"ehh... h-hihh... hhuHH...!"

Jake clung tightly to his nose hair, halfway up the side of his sister's nostril. He hoped desperately that Steph would be able to hold back, but it was looking less and less likely...

"Haahh... AHHH... het-CHOOO!!"
1212222111222112122112.title: An inconvenient speck

12122221112221121221122.content:
When Jake finally tumbled to a stop, he was somewhere covered in more of the fluffy grey stuff that had set off Stephanie's nose. Dust. He must be somewhere in the bathroom now.

Wincing, he slowly picked himself up. The thick dust clung to him. He was going to be covered in bruises tomorrow after that... Where the heck was he? He hadn't seen much of the bathroom, but this didn't look like any part he recognized. It was too SMALL. The metal ceiling above looked cathedral-sized to him, but he doubted someone on Steph's scale could even fit their head in here.

Looking around, Jake spotted what looked to him like a sheer cliff, the floor just ending beyond a set of massive metal pillars. Except they were't pillar shaped exactly, the looked more like vertical sheets of metal. Approaching the edge, he could see the top of Steph's head far below as she frantically searched the bathroom. Wait. The top of her head? He must be up near the ceiling...

Suddenly the scene flipped into a new perspective. He was in... Well, it was a hole in the wall near the ceiling... Those pillars must be a grate of some sort... An air conditioning vent? Now that he though about it, Jake could feel a steady breeze flowing from behind him out into the room. So he was in a vent. More importantly, how the heck was he going to get Steph's attention from up here!? He actually felt a little bad for her as she checked every surface in the bathroom for him. She actually looked legitimately worried. "Come on, Steph!" Jake urged, waving his arms "look up!"

Unfortunately, she didn't seem to be catching on. Maybe he was simply too tiny and far away to spot, or maybe she just never thought to look up, but Jake's heart fell as Steph began re-checking the same places, panic apparent in her expression. Nervously he eyed the drop. Hey was pretty sure that being tiny made falls safer, it was pretty much the only explanation for how he'd survived that sneeze, but he didn't want to test if her could fall that far. Could he climb down? He'd climbed Steph before, but a smooth tile wall was very different from soft flesh and fabric. He needed to make up his mind soon...

...too late. Jake watched in horror as Stephanie left the bathroom looking dejected, worry and guilt showing on her face. Jake softly heard her mutter "...find him when he's back to normal size..." as she flipped off the light.

Jake stood in the dark for a moment.

"...Well, fuck."

"Jake! S-slow down, I'm serious! It r-really tickles!" Stephanie warned.

Jake didn't care. The clock was ticking and the end was in sight. The opening from Stephanie's nostril to the outside world was enormous as Jake frantically rushed over and through the blonde nose hairs in his way. He was almost there!

"Sorry, Steph, can't stop now! Almost there," he declared, placing a hand on the inner wall of her nostril and reaching around inside the other nostril to hug the septum with his whole body.

"No, I'm -- hhhaaa -- I'm trying to -- hhHAaa!"

Jake swore. He was playing a dangerous game and now it sounded like he was about to lose. He couldn't see his sister's eyes from his position, but he imagined they were firmly shut by this point.

With nothing else to lose, Jake gripped the flesh of Stephanie's septum and started climbing his way up as quickly as he could. "Almost there! Just gotta make it to the tip! Just gotta make it!"

12122222.content:
Stephanie hastily pulled the feather from her nose, wincing as its fluffy barbs brushed along the delicate walls of her nose, worsening the already-growing urge. Her nostrils flared up, breath starting to huff again.

Steph screwed up her face in concentration, scrunching her nose back and forth in an attempt to fight the building sneeze. She held her breath, fighting to hold it in, but it was no use. The tickling had worked too well. Stephanie had pushed her nose past the point of no return; a sneeze was inevitable whether she wanted to or not.

Try as she might, Stephanie’s head started to tilt back, her breath huffing and hitching as her body prepared to sneeze. “Ehhh… H-hehh…” Silently she apologized to Jake, hoping he wouldn’t be hurt. She couldn’t hold it back much longer…

Meanwhile, outside the door, Veronica was starting to get impatient. What was Stephie doing in there?! She decided to come in despite Steph’s protest, and opened the door just in time to get a good view down the barrels of her friend’s widely flared nostrils.

“HEhh… HISHEEEW!”

Stephanie pitched forward with the force of the sneeze, inadvertently spraying Veronica with a light mist. Despite her concern over Jake, it felt good to finally get the tickle out. Without opening her eyes Steph sniffled and rubbed her nose, not yet realizing she’d just sneeze directly into her friend’s face.

122.content:
You stand up on the bed and take a few steps toward the desk. It doesn't seem to matter much, since everything is still huge and far away, but it helps to normalize your situation somewhat. After staring at the person seated at the desk for a few seconds, your best guess is that it's a girl. You can't quite tell who it is, but their bob-cut brown hair is distinctly feminine. As you take a few more steps toward the end of the bed, the giant girl reaches a hand out to the side. You're still nowhere near her, but you still freeze briefly in fear. The girl's fingers feel around on the desk for a moment before stumbling upon a box of tissues. Knowing there's nothing else you can do, you continue on your way as the girl plucks a tissue out of the box and brings it to her face. As you arrive at the edge of the bed, the girl takes a deep breath and blows her nose into the tissue. She wipes the soft paper back and forth under her nostrils a few times, and then she finally speaks up.

"Ugh, darn allergies," the girl says, her voice somewhat familiar. You turn your full attention to her in another attempt to figure out who she is. You're in luck: the girl turns slightly toward you to throw her tissue away, and you recognize the glasses and demure facial features.

"Beth!" you say out loud, recognizing your sister's freshman roommate. She clearly doesn't hear you as she tosses her tissue into a nearby waste basket, and then she gently rubs a finger back and forth under her nose before turning back to her desk.

You aren't terribly close with any of Stephanie's friends, but Beth is the only one who's always been nice to you. Maybe she can help you out, but it could be dangerous to even get close to her.

He watches her walk over to her bed and plop down. Jake walks over to the edge of the desk and hop on down from it. He manages to land comfortably on the smooth skin of Beth's neck. Jake sailed through the air momentarily, then crashed down onto the moist flesh of the inside of Beth's nose. He rolled over a few times as he made impact, brushing over a couple of nose hairs as he did so. Finally coming to a stop, a slightly dazed Jake on his back looked up at the cavern he now inhabited.

"Ugh," he groaned, a bit dizzy. "Where the hell is Steph and why the hell am I so damn tiny?!" he complained aloud, frustrated with the whole situation. Jake sighed and began to reason out loud to himself. "Well, I ended up here really just to save my progress. I still need someone's attention, and since I'm literally inside Beth right now, she's probably my best bet. I guess I can either get out of here and start climbing again, or try my luck getting her attention from right here inside her nose."

12222221221112111121.content:
"No, no, no!" Jake cried, watching in horror as his grip slipped more and more right before his eyes. Beth's relatively gentle head bobbing was flinging his whole body back and forth, and within a few seconds his entire grasp on the edge of Beth's nostril had broke loose.

Swearing as he fell through the air, Jake stuck out his arms and legs instinctively so as to increase his chances of making contact with something. As luck would have it, his left arm knocked into Beth's right breast as he sailed downward. Immediately grabbing onto the fabric of the girl's shirt with all his strength, he broke his fall and, with some difficulty, climbed up onto her chest. Huffing and puffing, Jake began to calm himself down.

"Hey, see? I told you you could dance!" Veronica complimented her friend.

Beth laughed. "Okay, so I definitely don't hate it," Beth admitted, still swinging her body to the music. Jake was still being rocked back and forth, but was no longer in any immediate danger of falling. "I'm kinda thirsty, though, now. Come get a drink with me?"

"Sure, me too," Veronica agreed, and the two girls moved themselves toward the kitchen. Jake adjusted his position atop his new curvy seat and, unbeknownst to either girl, came along with them.
12222221221112111121.title: Jake falls off of Beth's face

choices: Beth goes back to her room to be alone
122222212211121111212.content:
Upon arriving in the kitchen, Veronica grabbed a bottle of beer from a large cooler on the floor. She offered one to Beth as well, but the bespectacled girl shook her head and instead retrieved a can of soda from the fridge.

"So, you didn't answer my question before," said Veronica after only a single sip of her drink. Beth turned to her and raised an eyebrow.

"No boyfriend or anything?"

Beth's eyes widened and her face turned bright red. She choked on her soda, spraying a bit out of her mouth. Veronica laughed as Beth coughed and patted her chest, very nearly knocking Jake off again.

"Veronica! Sheesh!" Beth stammered, still blushing heavily. She cleared her throat, and then she nervously looked around to make sure no one else was nearby.

"I don't have a boyfriend! God! But I... I do kind of have a crush on someone. Maybe a little."

Veronica simply smiled, trying her best to stay serious for her friend's sake. Beth took a few steps closer, starting to whisper.

"You can't tell anyone, though! Especially not Steph!"

"Okay, I promise."

Beth leaned in close to Veronica's ear, and then she took a deep breath to prepare herself. All the way down on top of her breast, Jake had no idea what she said when she whispered to Veronica. Based on Veronica's reaction, however, Jake thought maybe it was for the best that he didn't know.

"What!? Really? Him?" Veronica spluttered, genuinely surprised. Jake was expecting her to laugh at whatever Beth confessed, and he was surprised to hear her sounding almost disgusted. Beth blushed and pouted, folding her arms. Jake nearly fell once again as Beth squeezed her chest in a huff.

"Shut up! You're the one who wanted to know!" she whined, lifting one hand to angrily adjust her glasses.
122222212211121111212.title: Beth admits to Veronica that she has a crush on...

choices: Meet Stephanie in the living room
Meet Natasha in the living room
1222222122111211112122.content:
"I know, I know, I'm sorry. Just surprised is all!" Veronica told her friend.

"Oh, come on, I know you hate him. Whatever, I think he's sweet," Beth admitted, blushing again. "He's cute, too. Don't you think?"

"I never said I hated him," Veronica answered, now on the defensive. "I don't know, I guess I never really looked at him like that. We just -- we don't really get along, you know? I'm happy for you, though. Really!"

Jake, from his seat on Beth's chest, looked up at Veronica as she spoke. They're not talking about me, right? he thought to himself only semi-seriously. He wasn't really sure how he'd feel if they were -- he'd always thought Beth was a nice girl and all, but he hadn't actually "looked at her like that" either.

Beth took a sip of her soda. "All right, well, should we go back to the living room for a bit? I do wanna get back to studying soon..." she began.

"Girl, you gotta live a little more! Yeah, let's go back to the living room. Maybe we'll even run into Jake," Veronica added with a whisper.

Jake's heart skipped a beat. Holy crap, they were talking about me!

"Stop!" Beth whined, looking around her again to make sure no one else was in earshot. Then she added a little nervously, "Why, he's not here, is he?"

"No," Veronica laughed. "I mean, I don't know, it is his sister's party, but I don't think he's here," she spoke softly. "Anyway, let's get back to the fun!"
1222222122111211112122.title: Returning to the party

12222221221112111121222.content:
While Veronica returned to the dance floor, Beth was feeling notably tired. What little dancing she had already done, on top of confessing her crush to her friend, had left her exhausted. Instead of dancing some more, Beth sat back down on the couch with her half-empty can of soda and let out a sigh. Jake bounced as Beth settled, but he still felt reasonably safe on her chest once she was stationary. Tipping his head back, he stared up at the giant girl from below. From here, most of her features were obscured by her jaw, but Jake could make out Beth's glasses as well as most of the underside of her nose. Beth's long, thin nostrils flared briefly, and then she reached up a finger to rub underneath them. Jake was confident that he wasn't discovering any long-hidden feelings for her or anything quite like that, but after hearing her profess her crush on him, he had to admit she could be pretty cute.

"Hey, Beth!" said a cheerful voice as another girl sat down beside her.

"Hi, Natasha," Beth replied, still rubbing her finger under her nose. Jake didn't know Natasha especially well, but from what he could remember, she was nice enough, but hyper and bubbly to the point of being annoying. Beth seemed to agree.

"Here, let me help!" Natasha chirped, noticing Beth's itchy nose. She reached out a finger, touched it to the tip of Beth's nose, and then pushed up firmly. Beth scrunched up her face, recoiling slightly.

"There, is that better?" asked Natasha, giggling as she continued to give Beth a pig-nose. Still wrinkling her nose, Beth forced her eyes open and gave Natasha an unimpressed stare.

"Not really, no."

Natasha had barely done anything and Jake was starting to feel annoyed on Beth's behalf. After just a few seconds, he wasn't sure if Natasha wouldn't happen to simply slap him off of Beth's chest, either crushing him or sending him to his doom. Deciding he'd be safer if he could at least get on top of Beth's shoulder, Jake grabbed a hold of the giant girl's shirt and began to climb once again.
12222221221112111121222.title: Meet Natasha in the living room

122222212211121111212221.content:
Luckily for Jake, Beth made no major movements over the course of the next few moments, which allowed for him to reach the girl's shoulder without much fuss. Slowly standing up to keep his balance, Jake turned around to see Natasha with her arm outstretched, her finger still on Beth's nose.

"Really? Nothing?" the blonde girl asked.

"Nope," Beth responded, a little exasperated. "Still itches." She sniffed, then brought her own finger up to her nose to rub it again, causing Natasha to move hers away.

"Wow, I thought that would've worked," Natasha said half-jokingly. She was a little tipsy at this point. "How about this?" she teased, pinching Beth's nostrils lightly a few times.

Beth scrunched up her face as Natasha squeezed her nose. "Stop," she protested, trying to move Natasha's arm away from her face.

Natasha laughed. "I'm trying to help you!"

Jeez, this girl can really get on someone's nerves, Jake thought, grabbing onto a lock of Beth's hair to stabilize himself as the girls moved around.
122222212211121111212221.title: Natasha teases Beth

1222222122111211112122212.content:
"Here, this should do it," Natasha continued, her voice suddenly rather sultry. Beth scooted back as far as she could, but Natasha quickly overtook her. Jake held on tight, not sure what was about to happen, but he couldn't look away as Natasha began to slowly move her face toward Beth's. For a second Jake thought Natasha was about to give the bespectacled girl a kiss, but then Natasha simply touched her nose against Beth's. Beth's eyes widened in self-conscious horror as Natasha gently nuzzled her nose with her own.

"N-Natasha, stop it!" Beth pleaded, starting to blush furiously. Natasha shook her head, only causing her noses to press together even more.

"No way. You know you like it," she teased, her voice low and calm. Beth's nose was a bit bigger than Natasha's, but it was also softer, allowing Natasha's nose to squish it around easily. She would never admit it, but Beth did actually notice the itch in her nose starting to die down, at least for a few seconds. Before long, Beth noticed a sweet, flowery scent worming its way into her nostrils. Wrinkling her nose, she took in two rapid sniffs and realized what it was: Natasha's perfume. Luckily Beth wasn't allergic to perfume, but her nose was already itchy enough that the fragrance was starting to push her over the edge.

"Nuh... Natasha..." Beth breathed, her eyelids starting to flutter. "Y-your perfume..."

"Oh? You like it?" Natasha cooed, continuing to nuzzle Beth. The shy girl shook her head, unable to open her eyes anymore as the urge to sneeze started to take over.

"It's... It's tickling my nose! Ah... Ahh... Ahhh..."

Realizing that Beth had a sneeze coming on, Natasha finally stopped nuzzling her and leaned back. She giggled at Beth's tortured face for a second, and then she teasingly placed her finger underneath Beth's nostrils.

"Don't sneeze, Beth!"
1222222122111211112122212.title: Natasha keeps messing with Beth

choices: Natasha goes to look for Stephanie
12222221221112111121222121.content:
Although Natasha's nose nuzzling had actually been rather effective at calming the tickle in Beth's nose, Natasha's finger did very little to reduce the sting from her perfume. The blonde pushed Beth's nostrils up slightly and moved them from side to side with her finger.

Perhaps if Beth were in a movie or a cartoon things would play out differently, but the girl knew that she wouldn't actually be able to last much longer. "It's ... aahhh ... I ... aaahhhh," was all she could manage to get out.

"Don't--sneeze, don't--sneeze!" Natasha chanted, laughing. She didn't seem to get the hint from Beth's face that what she was doing was not working. Jake, on the other hand, knew how this was going to turn out. He gripped the lock of Beth's hair tighter, just as Beth tipped her head slightly back and inhaled once more.

"Haaahhh -- HACHOOOO!" she sneezed, spraying Natasha's finger.

Natasha really didn't seem to mind, though. "Awww, I guess it didn't work!" she giggled. "Bless you."

Beth sniffed and pulled a tissue from her pocket. "Thanks," she said, blowing her nose into it, a bit embarassed.
