Brianna stands up before Jake makes it to her face
1241.content:
Screw it, someone's gotta know what the hell is going on, Jake decided. Standing up on the floor, Jake began a jog over to the dresser where the girl still stood, examining herself in the mirror. As he approached the giant girl, though, she quickly turned and began to walk away from the mirror. Her right leg swung toward Jake unexpectedly, and Jake didn't have enough distance to slow himself down before crashing right into it.

"Oof!" he groaned, colliding with the girl's right pant leg, which he gripped onto tightly to avoid being kicked halfway across the room. The girl quickly paused, however, seeming to have forgotten something, and she turned back to the mirror, pulling up a small stool upon which she sat as she began to re-examine her face.

Jake collected his consciousness again and quickly scrambled up the pant leg to the girl's knee, which -- now that she was sitting -- he could rest on. Jake looked up at the mirror and saw the same semi-familiar face. The girl was applying eye makeup.

All right, I'd better make a move before she finishes and gets up again, Jake reasoned. Turning to face the girl's waist, Jake walked over to the girl's torso and grabbed onto her shirt to begin his climb. After about a minute of hard work, he made it to the girl's right shoulder, where he turned to look at the girl's face. She's just starting the other eye now, so I have some time, Jake thought, as he planned how best to get the attention of the enormous girl.
1241.title: Jake tries to get to Brianna

choices: Jake manages to reach Brianna's nose
Brianna finishes applying her makeup before Jake is ready
12411.content:
The fact that the girl was looking at herself in a mirror could have been a blessing and a curse. Jake hoped she would notice him if he started climbing onto her face, but at the same time, it could be dangerous if she saw him and panicked while he was still trying to climb. Turning his eyes from the reflection to the side of the girl's head, Jake noticed the tip of her nose protruding out past her cheek. Shrugging to himself, he figured that would be the best place for him to go; at least he wouldn't have to hang on for dear life.

Grabbing some of the girl's hair, Jake began to climb up the side of her neck. The girl didn't seem to notice, so Jake decided to take advantage of the quasi-rope for as long as he could. Eventually Jake managed to climb until he was about level with the girl's eyes. It was risky, but if he used her hair like a rope swing, he might just be able to make it to her nose. Jake thought about trying to simply get in front of her eye, but she probably wouldn't be able to tell he was even there if he simply swung some of her hair in front of her face. Holding on tight, Jake took a deep breath and prepared himself.
12411.title: Jake makes it to Brianna's face

Try and get Brianna's attention from the inside
124111.content:
"Okay, here goes," Jake muttered to himself. He bent his legs slightly and lept off the girl's shoulder while hugging the strand of her blonde hair.

Jake's legs flailed around a bit as he swung, like a pendulum, right past Brianna's nose. When he reached the end of his forward travel, though, he prepared for his opportunity -- slowing down and swinging backward now, Jake reached out toward Brianna's nose and grabbed hold of her left nostril, halting the swinging motion.

Jake released the blonde hair just in time for Brianna to reach up and brush the stray strand off of her face. "Hmmm," the girl thought, still examining her face in the mirror. Jake felt her nose vibrate when she made the sound. He turned his head around for a second and froze momentarily when he saw what Brianna was about to do.

The girl had reached for the nose powder again, which meant Jake's plans to get her attention -- from where he currently was, anyway -- were foiled. Acting quickly, Jake lowered himself down a bit from the outside of Brianna's nostril and then hoisted himself up inside her nose.

"Ugh," he complained, grabbing the moist flesh and crawling on it. Jake turned around and watched through Brianna's nostril as she, indeed, began to power her nose. Clearly he had made a good decision and avoided being crushed. The question now was what to do next.
124111.title: To the nose

choices: Brianna fights off the sneeze with a big snort
1241111.content:
Yeah, there was no way Jake was going to head back out there for a while. He'd be crushed. And yet, at the same time, there wasn't really much he could do in here. Jake remembered that only a few moments ago, Brianna's tiny hum had shaken the 'ground' under his feet like an earthquake. If that was the scale her voice was at, there was no chance of her being able to hear him right now.

Sighing, Jake leaned back against one slimy wall. At least it was pretty. For such a mundane thing, from this perspective the spectacle of Brianna powdering her nose was actually almost beautiful.The clouds of microscopic makeup particles drifted and wafted in the light streaming in from the nostril, forming glowing patterns in the air. The nose hairs were silhouetted against the light, casting long shadows. The overall effect was a little bit like being in a mist-filled forest at sunset, provided you didn't think about where you actually were. Jake got lost in his thoughts as he watched the pink slimy floor turn skin-colored at the drifting makeup settled to the ground.

Actually...

Jake blinked. Was it just him, or was a LOT if powder getting inside Brianna's nose? The inside of the nostril seemed practically coated in the stuff. Jake coughed as more of the floating powder was carried past him on the wind of Brianna's breath, heading deeper into the nose. This couldn't be right, could it? He'd never applied makeup himself, but this looked really uncomfortable.

Meanwhile...

Brianna's powder puff stopped, her hand hovering halfway between the table and her face. The girl had a distant look in her eyes. At the epicenter of the cloud of powder, Brianna's nose twitched, then scrunched, trying to fight the tickle gathering inside it.

"h-hehhhh..."
1241111.title: Too much powder...

choices: Stephanie drags Brianna out to the party
Stephanie helps Brianna put her makeup on properly
12411111.content:
Brianna raised a limp hand up to her face and began to wave it up and down in front of her nose. Her eyelids fluttered, and her waving hand froze in place. The girl's face scrunched up, and then she took a slow, deep breath as her shoulders tensed. Brianna stood rigid for a second, holding her breath as she hung on the edge of a sneeze, and then...

"Heiinnt! Choo!"

Brianna pressed her fingers against the underside of her nose just in time to stifle her sneeze. She let out a high-pitched breath afterward, but the force of the sneeze had been mostly contained. Opening her eyes, Brianna stared at herself in the mirror and let out a half-embarrassed giggle. Her freckled nose was caked in powder, and she looked especially silly with it squished up on top of her fingers. Smiling to herself, Brianna gently rubbed her nose, oblivious as Stephanie's patience finally ran out.

"Brianna!" she exclaimed, bursting the door open and quickly stepping into the room. Giggling again, Brianna turned to her friend.

"Oops, I sneezed," she said, unable to stop herself from smiling. Stephanie rolled her eyes.

"You always sneeze when you put on makeup."

"I get carried away."

Meanwhile, Jake found himself squished somewhere inside Brianna's nostril. The soft walls of the nose had collapsed in around him when Brianna had stifled her sneeze, and they didn't feel so soft now that they were squeezing him from all sides. Jake heard Brianna talking to his sister, but he was barely paying attention as he struggled to free himself. Eventually, Brianna finally removed her fingers from under her nose, allowing the soft flesh to spring back into place. Jake simply laid on his back for a moment, too exhausted to do anything else yet.
12411111.title: Brianna sneezes

124111111.content:
Stephanie looked Brianna up and down, before finally grabbing her arm. "Well, come on!" She said, dragging the still sniffly girl out of the room. "The others are already here!"

* * *

20 minutes later, Jake caught himself just as he was about to kick the nasal wall out of sheer boredom. That would have been a really stupid idea, he didn't know how easy to set off Brianna's nose was. Then again, a sneeze would at least give him something to do... How was hiding out in someone else's body cavity this DULL??

* * *

It might have surprised Jake to learn that roughly the same thoughts were going through Brianna's head. Yeah, she could be a party animal, but that was when people were actually DOING something. Just standing around drinking and chatting was boring, especially since most of the other girls were Stephanie's newer friends who she didn't really know very well. Except Beth. And Beth was... well, Beth. Not exactly the queen of excitement.

She knew the party would eventually get interesting once everyone was drunk enough, but for right now she was just killing time. So when the subject of party games was broached, Brianna literally jumped at the chance, drawing all eyes too her. She took a deep breath.

"I know! Let's play...."
124111111.title: Party games

choices: Jake gets thrown around as the girls play
Jake gets bored and wanders off
1241111111.content:
"I know! Let's play Twister!"

Brianna smiled and looked around the room. To nobody's surprise, she was by far the most excited of the bunch. Stephanie and Natasha seemed amenable, though Beth and Veronica looked as disinterested as ever.

"Ugh, really?" Beth complained, folding her arms. Brianna giggled, not about to be discouraged. She skipped over to her friend, hooked a finger around the bridge of Beth's glasses, and then pulled them down to the tip of her nose.

"Aww, come on, Beth! You don't have to play, you can just do the spinny thing!"

Beth frowned and pushed her glasses back up her nose, but eventually she rolled her eyes and sighed.

"Fiiiine," she groaned, letting her arms fall to her sides.

It was at this point that the other girls realized none of them owned Twister. Whether this was good or bad luck varied on an individual basis, but Brianna happily announced that she'd brought her own copy. Beth sat on the couch with the spinner as Brianna laid the mat out on the floor, and the others stood in between them.

"Alright! Who wants to go first?"
1241111111.title: Twister

choices: Jake tries to make Brianna sneeze and loose the game
Jake tries to fine somewhere safe to hang on to
12411111111.content:
Jake sat crosslegged in Brianna’s nostril, watching the girls start their game. Sure, it wasn’t the most entertaining view in the world, but it beat the alternatives of a slightly disturbing wall of glistening pink flesh or an organic cavern receding into darkness. It was certainly a lot safer than exploring the latter.

Or so Jake thought.

The game went well for a while, the girls slowly getting into the spirit, until Liz called out a very particular instruction.

“Left hand, red!”

Brianna bent over to comply, reaching across the mat and turning her body sideways to keep her balance. She giggled at the awkward position she’d ended up in. Inside her nose, Jake screamed. Gravity had shifted as Brianna tilted her head, what had been the wall now becoming the floor. As Jake shakily got to his feet, he realized he’d made a huge mistake. If Brianna tilted her head at the wrong angle, ‘down’ could easily become the vast drop outside her teardrop shaped nostrils… or worse, the lightless depths leading to her respiratory system. She was in a game all about natural poses and contortions, it was only a matter of time before the party girl innocently tilted her head forward or back and her fell to his death. He needed to do something!
12411111111.title: Gravity problems

choices: On the table, with the girls looking down at you
14.title: Somewhere else

info.brief_description: The reboot of the now deleted giantess/shrinking story by Blah-San.
info.description:
Welcome to the remake of Too Nosey for Your Party!

My account will merely be the one hosting the story, with his permission. Everything here belongs to Blah-San, the original maker of the interactive. This is his premise and first chapter too

With that said, let's get into the premise. Everything after this point is written by Blah-San, so any business regarding it should be taken up with him.



You’re a young man visiting a small party hosted by your sister. Your semester ended just before hers, and once you heard she was throwing a party, you couldn’t help but drop by. The only problem is she doesn’t want you interfering with her plans…

Shortly after arriving at the party, you find yourself shrunk down to barely the size of an ant. With no idea how long it'll last, you need to find a way to survive the party until it wears off, and that's if it wears off at all. Do you just try to hide and stay out of trouble, or do you try to get some of the girls to help you? Who knows what kind of trouble you'll find yourself in.

Rules:

- Don’t kill any characters.
- Some adult content is okay, but don’t make it pornographic.
- It’s okay to have some of the girls shrink too, but try to keep it limited. For example, only one shrunken girl per story path.
- Like I’ve said a million times before, I’m pretty much only into nose vore. That’s likely the only thing I’ll be writing, but feel free to include whatever you like in your own paths.
-Please right in the third-person.

Characters:

The main character was named Jake in the old version of the story, but this time I’ve decided to make him more of a blank slate. I suppose he can still be named Jake for ease of use.

Stephanie
Age: 21
Height: 5’6”
Hair: Blonde, long, curly.
Eyes: Blue
Info: Stephanie is Jake’s younger sister, and she’s something of a stereotypical queen bee. She’s generally polite and nice to her friends, but she’s also selfish and short-tempered. Stephanie can get along with her brother, but she generally dislikes it when he interacts with her friends. Despite wanting to get him out of her party, she wouldn’t actually wish any extreme harm upon him.

Beth
Age: 21
Height: 5’5”
Hair: Brown, short, straight
Eyes: Brown, glasses
Info: Beth is the most unlikely of Stephanie’s friends. They don’t have very much in common, but they were roommates in their freshman year and they decided to stick together. While Stephanie is stylish and outgoing, Beth is nerdy and shy. In fact, she’s probably too busy studying for finals to participate in the party, not that she’d want to anyway. Additionally, Beth is allergic to pollen and dust, and she has a bit of a crush on Jake.

Natasha
Age: 21
Height: 5’45”
Hair: Blonde, short, curly
Eyes: Green
Info: Natasha is Stephanie’s best friend, and the two of them are remarkably similar. If Stephanie is the queen bee, Natasha is her second in command. This isn’t to say they spend all their time gossiping and picking on people. On the contrary, the two of them will have fun together no matter what they do.

Veronica
Age: 22
Height: 6’0”
Hair: Black, long, straight
Eyes: Brown
Info: Veronica is one of Beth’s closest friends, despite being a year older and a star player on the women’s basketball team. Although she primarily came to the party to keep Beth company, Veronica will likely spend most of her time drinking or dancing. She’s mostly tolerant of Stephanie’s behavior, but she doesn’t seem to like Jake very much. He’s never quite been able to figure out why.

Brianna
Age: 21
Height: 5’3”
Hair: Blonde, medium, straight
Eyes: Brown
Info: Another friend of Stephanie’s from freshman year, Brianna is energetic and fun-loving. They get along well, though Brianna seems generally unaware of Stephanie’s occasionally rude behavior. Also, unlike most of Stephanie’s other friends, Brianna doesn’t really know Jake at all.
info.pretty_title: Too Nosey for Your Party Redux
